BaseOneRate.description: Rate expressed as a decimal, for example, 0.7 is 7/10 and 70%.

DecimalNumber.description: Number of objects represented as a decimal number, for example 0.75 or 45.6.

ISODate.description: A particular point in the progression of time in a calendar year expressed in the YYYY-MM-DD format. This representation is defined in "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition - W3C Recommendation 28 October 2004" which is aligned with ISO 8601.

ISODateTime.description:
A particular point in the progression of time defined by a mandatory date and a mandatory time component, expressed in either UTC time format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ), local time with UTC offset format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss+/-hh:mm), or local time format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss). These representations are defined in "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition - W3C Recommendation 28 October 2004" which is aligned with ISO 8601.
Note on the time format:
1) beginning / end of calendar day
00:00:00 = the beginning of a calendar day
24:00:00 = the end of a calendar day
2) fractions of second in time format
Decimal fractions of seconds may be included. In this case, the involved parties shall agree on the maximum number of digits that are allowed.

Number.description: Number of objects represented as an integer.

PercentageRate.description: Rate expressed as a percentage, that is, in hundredths, for example, 0.7 is 7/10 of a percent, and 7.0 is 7%.

PlusOrMinusIndicator.description: Indicates a positive or negative value.

TrueFalseIndicator.description: A flag indicating a True or False value.

ActionType13Code.description:
Type of action to be performed by the point of interaction (POI).
Code: DISP:	DisplayMessage:	Definition: Message to display, print or log.
Code: PRNT:	PrintMessage:	Definition: Print a message.
Code: RFRL:	Referral:	Definition: Referral has to be performed.
Code: CPTR:	CaptureCard:	Definition: Capture the card.
Code: PINR:	PINRetry:	Definition: PIN (Personal Identification Number) is wrong, retry a PIN verification.
Code: PINL:	PINLastTry:	Definition: Last PIN (Personal Identification Number) try.
Code: RQDT:	RequestData:	Definition: Request additional data through a displayed text and request confirmation by an attendant.
Code: BUSY:	Busy:	Definition: Server busy, try later.
Code: RQID:	IdentificationRequired:	Definition: Additional identification required (passport, ID card, etc.).
Code: NOVR:	ForbidOverride:	Definition: Payment application cannot propose to the merchant an override of the payment transaction.
Code: DCCQ:	AcceptCurrencyConversion:	Definition: Ask the cardholder to accept the currency conversion.
Code: DCLN:	Decline:	Definition: Decline the transaction.
Code: TRCK:	UpdateTrack:	Definition: Track provided in the response must be updated on the card.
Code: HAMT:	AcceptHigherAmount:	Definition: MinimumAmount must be accepted.
Code: LAMT:	AcceptLowerAmount:	Definition: MaximumAuthorisedAmount must be accepted.
Code: FEES:	AcceptFees:	Definition: Fees must be accepted.
Code: CPNS:	DistributeCoupon:	Definition: Distribute a coupon from the cassette of coupon.
Code: RQST:	PerformRequest:	Definition: Request to be performed by the ATM.
Code: NDCL:	NoReasonForDecline:	Definition: No reason for declining the transaction.
Code: BLCK:	BlockCard:	Definition: Block the card.
Code: APPV:	Approve:	Definition: Approve the transaction.
Code: FLFW:	FallForward:	Definition: Fall-forward from contactless to chip card transaction required.
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other action defined at national level.
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other action defined at private level
Code: ACVF:	AgentCardholderVerification:	Definition: Cardholder verification through a third party.
Code: AGCV:	AgentCardVerification:	Definition: Card verification through a third party.
Code: AGCA:	AgentCardholderAuthentication:	Definition: Cardholder authentication through a third party
Code: ACAU:	AgentCardAuthentication:	Definition: Card authentication through a third party.
Code: CHDV:	CardholderVerification:	Definition: Additional verification of cardholder required.
Code: CAVF:	CardVerification:	Definition: Additional verification of card required.
Code: CHDA:	CardholderAuthentication:	Definition: Additional authentication of cardholder required.
Code: CAAU:	CardAuthentication:	Definition: Additional authentication of card required.
Code: IDNS:	IncDecNotSupported:	Definition: Increments and/or decrements to current reservations not supported.
Code: ICVF:	IssuerCardholderVerification:	Definition: Additional verification of cardholder by card issuer required.
Code: ICDV:	IssuerCardVerfification:	Definition: Additional verification of card by card issuer required.
Code: ICHA:	IssuerCardholderAuthentication:	Definition: Additional authentication of the cardholder by the card issuer required.
Code: ICAA:	IssuerCardAuthentication:	Definition: Additional authentication of card by the card issuer required.
Code: SCHV:	SpecialCardholderVerification:	Definition: Special verification action to be performed on the cardholder due to a high level of risk.
Code: URNS:	UpdateReservationNotSupported:	Definition: Update reservations not supported.
Code: ACTV:	Activate:	Definition: Activate device or service.
Code: DEAC:	Deactivate:	Definition: Deactivate device or service.
Code: FUPD:	FileUpdate:	Definition: Update a data file.
Code: SNDM:	SendMessage:	Definition: Send a message.
Code: CNTI:	ContactIssuer:	Definition: Contact card issuer.
Code: CNIS:	ContactIssuerSpecialConditions:	Definition: Refer to card issuer's special conditions.
Code: CNTA:	ContactAcquirer:	Definition: Contact acquirer.
Code: VIPM:	VIPAccountManagement:	Definition: Manage account as a VIP one.
Code: TRXR:	ReEnterTransaction:	Definition: Transaction to be re-entered.
Code: CNAS:	ContactAcquirerSecurity:	Definition: Card acceptor to call acquirer's security department.
Code: STUA:	StepUpAuthentication:	Definition: Further authentication required (e.g. one-time password)
Code: PINQ:	PINRequest:	Definition: Request Cardholder Authentification through PIN insertion.
Code: CDCV:	ConsumerDeviceCardholderVerificationMethod:	Definition: Request Cardholder Authentification according to the ConsumerDeviceCardholderVerificationMethod.
Code: SIGN:	Signature:	Definition: Signature required.
Code: STOR:	StopOneRecurring:	Definition: Cardholder has revocated this recurring transaction for this merchant.
Code: STAR:	StopAllRecurring:	Definition: Recurring transactions is no more allowed for this card and for all merchants.
Code: DNTA:	DoNotTryAgain:	Definition: Indicates that this account shouldn't be used anymore.
Code: ACUP:	AccountUpdate:	Definition: Indicates that the account was updated and should be taken into account for future authorisation.
Code: TALT:	TryAgainLater:	Definition: Indicates that the authorization should be resubmitted at a later time.

AddressType2Code.description:
Specifies the type of address.
Code: HOME:	Residential:	Definition: Address is the home address.
Code: BIZZ:	Business:	Definition: Address is the business address.
Code: ADDR:	Postal:	Definition: Address is the complete postal address.
Code: PBOX:	POBox:	Definition: Address is a postal office (PO) box.
Code: MLTO:	MailTo:	Definition: Address is the address to which mail is sent.
Code: DLVY:	DeliveryTo:	Definition: Address is the address to which delivery is to take place.

Code: DA19:	AESDUKPT192ECB:	Definition: AES DUKPT (Derived Unique Key Per Transaction) ECB algorithm, as specified in ANSI X9.24-3-2017 Annex A.With key length of 192 bits.

Code: EA2R:	AES128CTR:	Definition: AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) CTR (Counter) encryption with a 128 bits cryptographic key as defined by the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS 197 - November 6, 2001 - Advanced Encryption Standard).
Code: EA9R:	AES192CTR:	Definition: AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) CTR (Counter) encryption with a 192 bits cryptographic key as defined by the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS 197 - November 6, 2001 - Advanced Encryption Standard).

Code: ECP3:	SignatureWithEllipticCurveP-384:	Definition: Elliptic Curve Signature with the Curve P-384 as defined by the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS 186-4 - July, 2013 - Digital Signature Standard).
Code: ECP5:	SignatureWithEllipticCurveP-512:	Definition: Elliptic Curve Signature with the Curve P-512 as defined by the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS 186-4 - July, 2013 - Digital Signature Standard).
Code: E3DR:	DES112CTR:	Definition: Triple DES (Data Encryption Standard) CTR (Counter) encryption with double length key (112 Bit) as defined in FIPS SP 800-38a.
Code: E36C:	DES168CBC:	Definition: Triple DES (Data Encryption Standard) CBC (Chaining Block Cypher) encryption with triple length key (168 Bit) as defined in FIPS PUB 46-3 - (ASN.1 Object Identifier: des-ede3-cbc).
Code: E36R:	DES168CTR:	Definition: Triple DES (Data Encryption Standard) CTR (Counter) encryption with triple length key (168 Bit) as defined in FIPS SP 800-38a.
Code: SD5C:	SDE056CBC:	Definition: The DEPRECATED Simple DES (Data Encryption Standard) CBC (Chaining Block Cypher) encryption with simple length key (56 Bit) as defined in FIPS PUB 81 - (ASN.1 Object Identifier: des-cbc).
Code: CCA1:	CMACAES128:	Definition: CMAC (Cipher based Message Authentication Code) defined by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST 800-38B - May 2005), using the block cipher Advanced Encryption Standard with a 128 bits cryptographic key, approved by the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS 197 - November 6, 2001 - Advanced Encryption Standard).
Code: CCA2:	CMACAES192:	Definition: CMAC (Cipher based Message Authentication Code) defined by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST 800-38B - May 2005), using the block cipher Advanced Encryption Standard with a 192 bits cryptographic key, approved by the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS 197 - November 6, 2001 - Advanced Encryption Standard).
Code: CCA3:	CMACAES256:	Definition: CMAC (Cipher based Message Authentication Code) defined by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST 800-38B - May 2005), using the block cipher Advanced Encryption Standard with a 256 bits cryptographic key, approved by the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS 197 - November 6, 2001 - Advanced Encryption Standard).

Code: DAES:	AESDUKPT:	Definition: AES with DUKPT
Code: SDES:	DES56CBC:	Definition: Single DES CBC mode
Code: UKA2:	UKPTwithAES192:	Definition: UKPT (Unique Key Per Transaction) or Master Session Key key encryption, using Advanced Encryption Standard with a 192 bits cryptographic key, approved by the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS 197 - November 6, 2001 - Advanced Encryption Standard).
Code: UKA3:	UKPTwithAES256:	Definition: UKPT (Unique Key Per Transaction) or Master Session Key key encryption, using Advanced Encryption Standard with a 256 bits cryptographic key, approved by the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS 197 - November 6, 2001 - Advanced Encryption Standard).

AmountUnit1Code.description:
Unit of a amount (for loyalty or account).
Code: POIN:	Point:	Definition: The amount is expressed in point.
Code: MONE:	Monetary:	Definition: The amount is expressed in a monetary value in a currency.

AttendanceContext1Code.description:
Human attendance at the POI location during the transaction.
Code: ATTD:	Attended:	Definition: Attended payment, with an attendant.
Code: SATT:	SemiAttended:	Definition: Semi-attended, including self checkout. An attendant supervises several payment, and could be called to help the cardholder.
Code: UATT:	Unattended:	Definition: Unattended payment, no attendant present.
Code: ATTL:	AttendantDelivery:	Definition: Delivery by an attendant.
Code: CUST:	CustomerDelivery:	Definition: Delivery by the customer.
Code: CARR:	CarrierDelivery:	Definition: Delivery by a carrier.
Code: FULL:	FullServe:	Definition: Full service for fuel distribution.
Code: SELF:	SelfServe:	Definition: Self service for fuel distribution.

AttendanceContext2Code.description:
Identify the method of delivery or distribution.
Code: ATTD:	Attended:	Definition: Attended payment, with an attendant.
Code: SATT:	SemiAttended:	Definition: Semi-attended, including self checkout. An attendant supervises several payment, and could be called to help the cardholder.
Code: UATT:	Unattended:	Definition: Unattended payment, no attendant present.
Code: ATTL:	AttendantDelivery:	Definition: Delivery by an attendant.
Code: CUST:	CustomerDelivery:	Definition: Delivery by the customer.
Code: CARR:	CarrierDelivery:	Definition: Delivery by a carrier.
Code: FULL:	FullServe:	Definition: Full service for fuel distribution.
Code: SELF:	SelfServe:	Definition: Self service for fuel distribution.

AttributeType1Code.description:
Type of attribute of a distinguished name (DN).
Code: CNAT:	CommonName:	Definition: Common name of the attribute (ASN.1 Object Identifier: id-at-commonName).
Code: LATT:	Locality:	Definition: Locality of the attribute (ASN.1 Object Identifier: id-at-localityName).
Code: OATT:	OrganisationName:	Definition: Organization name of the attribute (ASN.1 Object Identifier: id-at-organizationName).
Code: OUAT:	OrganisationUnitName:	Definition: Organization unit name of the attribute (ASN.1 Object Identifier: id-at-organizationalUnitName).
Code: CATT:	CountryName:	Definition: Country name of the attribute (ASN.1 Object Identifier: id-at-countryName).
Code: EMAL:	EmailAddress:	Definition: Email address of the certificate subject.
Code: CHLG:	ChallengePassword:	Definition: Password by which an entity may request certificate revocation.

AuthenticationEntity2Code.description:
Entity or device that has performed the verification.
Code: ICCD:	ICC:	Definition: Application in the chip card (Integrated Circuit Card), for instance an offline PIN verification.
Code: AGNT:	AuthorisedAgent:	Definition: Authorisation agent of the issuer.
Code: MERC:	Merchant:	Definition: Merchant (for example signature verification by the attendant).
Code: ACQR:	Acquirer:	Definition: Acquirer of the transaction.
Code: ISSR:	Issuer:	Definition: Card issuer.
Code: TRML:	Terminal:	Definition: Secure application in the terminal.

AuthenticationMethod6Code.description:
Methods used to authenticate a person or a card.
Code: UKNW:	UnknownMethod:	Definition: Authentication method is performed unknown.
Code: BYPS:	Bypass:	Definition: Authentication bypassed by the merchant.
Code: NPIN:	OnLinePIN:	Definition: On-line PIN authentication (Personal Identification Number).
Code: FPIN:	OfflinePIN:	Definition: Off-line PIN authentication (Personal Identification Number).
Code: CPSG:	SignatureCapture:	Definition: Electronic signature capture (handwritten signature).
Code: PPSG:	PaperSignature:	Definition: Handwritten paper signature.
Code: MANU:	ManualVerification:	Definition: Manual verification, for example passport or drivers license.
Code: MERC:	MerchantAuthentication:	Definition: Merchant-related authentication.
Code: SCRT:	SecureCertificate:	Definition: Electronic commerce transaction secured with the X.509 certificate of a customer.
Code: SNCT:	SecureNoCertificate:	Definition: Secure electronic transaction without cardholder certificate.
Code: SCNL:	SecuredChannel:	Definition: Channel-encrypted transaction.
Code: PSWD:	Password:	Definition: Authentication by a password.
Code: ADDB:	BillingAddressVerification:	Definition: Cardholder billing address verification.
Code: BIOM:	Biometry:	Definition: Biometric authentication of the cardholder.
Code: CDHI:	CardholderIdentificationData:	Definition: Cardholder data provided for verification, for instance social security number, driver license number, passport number.
Code: CRYP:	CryptogramVerification:	Definition: Verification of a cryptogram generated by a chip card or another device, for instance ARQC (Authorisation Request Cryptogram).
Code: CSCV:	CSCVerification:	Definition: Verification of Card Security Code.
Code: PSVE:	PassiveAuthentication:	Definition: Authentication based on statistical cardholder behaviour.
Code: CSEC:	SecureElectronicCommerce:	Definition: Authentication performed during a secure electronic commerce transaction.
Code: ADDS:	ShippingAddressVerification:	Definition: Cardholder shipping address verification.
Code: TOKN:	TokenAuthentication:	Definition: Cryptogram generated by the token requestor or a customer device to validate the authorised use of a token.
Code: TOKP:	PaymentToken:	Definition: Verification or authentication related to the use of a payment token, for instance the validation of the authorised use of a token.
Code: TOKA:	AuthenticationToken:	Definition: A token is used to verify an already performed authentication.
Code: MOBL:	Mobile:	Definition: Customer mobile device.
Code: OTHR:	Other:	Definition: Other customer authentication.
Code: ADVF:	AddressDigits:	Definition: Digits of the address.
Code: ARNB:	AlienRegistrationNumber:	Definition: Number assigned by a government agency to identify foreign nationals.
Code: ARQC:	ARQCVerification:	Definition: Verification of a cryptogram generated by a chip card, for instance an ARQC (Authorisation Request Cryptogram).
Code: BTHD:	BirthDate:	Definition: Date of birth of a person.
Code: CHDN:	CardholderName:	Definition: Name of cardholder
Code: COFB:	CityOfBirth:	Definition: City of birth to authenticate a person.
Code: CUID:	CustomerIdentification:	Definition: Customer number used as a mechanism of authentication.
Code: DRVI:	DriverIdentification:	Definition: Identification of a driver in a fleet of vehicles.
Code: DRLN:	DriverLicenseNumber:	Definition: Number assigned by a driving license authority to a person driving a car.
Code: EMAL:	Email:	Definition: Electronic mail address
Code: EMIN:	EmployeeIdentificationNumber:	Definition: Number assigned to an employee by an employer.
Code: EMRN:	EmployerIdentificationNumber:	Definition: Number assigned to an employer by a registration authority.
Code: IDCN:	IdentityCardNumber:	Definition: Number assigned by a national authority to an identity card.
Code: OTPW:	OneTimePassword:	Definition: Verification of a one-time password provided by the issuer.
Code: OCHI:	OtherCardholderIdentification:	Definition: Other cardholder data provided for identification.
Code: OTHC:	OtherCryptogram:	Definition: Verification of a cryptogram generated by a non-card form factor.
Code: PASN:	PassportNumber:	Definition: Number assigned by a passport authority to a passport.
Code: PCDV:	PostalCode:	Definition: Verification based on digits of the postal code.
Code: SHAF:	ShippingAddressFrom:	Definition: Shipping address from verification.
Code: SHAT:	ShippingAddressTo:	Definition: Shipping address to verification
Code: CHSA:	CardholderAddress:	Definition: Verification whether the address corresponds to the cardholder's one.
Code: NVSC:	NonVisibleCSC:	Definition: Non visible Card Security Code.
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other type of verification defined at national level.
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other type of verification defined at private level
Code: PLOB:	PlaceOfBirth:	Definition: Place of birth of a person.
Code: SSNB:	SocialSecurityNumber:	Definition: Number assigned by a social security agency.
Code: TXIN:	TaxIdentificationNumber:	Definition: Number assigned by a tax authority to an entity.
Code: APKI:	AccountDigitalSignature:	Definition: Account-based digital signature authentication.
Code: ARPC:	ARPCVerification:	Definition: Response Card Cryptogram (ARPC)  verification.
Code: ATCC:	ATC:	Definition: Application Transaction Counter
Code: FBIG:	OffLineBiographics:	Definition: Biographics authentication in an offline mode.
Code: FBIO:	OffLineBiometrics:	Definition: Biometrics authentication in an offline mode
Code: OLDA:	OffLineDataAuthentication:	Definition: Authentication of data in an offline mode
Code: OLDS:	OffLineDigitisedSignatureAnalysis:	Definition: Analysis of signature transmitted offline
Code: OFPE:	OffLinePINEncrypted:	Definition: PIN generated offline and transmitted encrypted
Code: FCPN:	OffLinePINInClear:	Definition: PIN generated offline and transmitted in clear
Code: NBIG:	OnLineBiographics:	Definition: Biographics authentication in an online mode.
Code: PHOM:	PhoneHome:	Definition: Customer home phone number.
Code: PWOR:	PhoneWork:	Definition: Customer work phone number
Code: PKIS:	PKISignature:	Definition: PKI (Public Key Infrastructure) based digital signature
Code: QWAC:	QualifiedCertificate:	Definition: QualifiedCertificate
Code: THDS:	ThreeDS:	Definition: Authentication performed during a secure electronic commerce transaction.
Code: CHSN:	CardholderCertificateSerialNumber:	Definition: Serial number of the cardholder's certificate.
Code: ACSN:	AcceptorCertificateSerialNumber:	Definition: Serial number of the acceptor's certificate.
Code: NTID:	NationalIdentifier:	Definition: Nationally assigned identifier.

AuthenticationResult1Code.description:
Specifies the result of authentication done.
Code: DENY:	Denial:	Definition: The authentication didn’t succeed.
Code: CARD:	NonParticipation:	Definition: The card does not participate in the authentication programme.
Code: AUTH:	UnableToAuthenticate:	Definition: The authentication couldn’t be carried out.
Code: MRCH:	MerchantNotEnroled:	Definition: Merchant not enrolled in the authentication programme.
Code: CRPT:	WithCryptogram:	Definition: Authentication succeeded with a cryptogram.
Code: UCRP:	WithoutCryptogram:	Definition: Authentication succeeded without a cryptogram.

BarcodeType1Code.description:
Type of BarCode coding.
Code: EAN8:	BarcodeEncodedAsEAN8:	Definition: Barcode encoded according to the EAN8 standard.
Code: EA13:	BarcodeEncodedAsEA13:	Definition: Barcode encoded according to the EAN13 standard.
Code: C039:	BarcodeEncodedAsCode39:	Definition: Barcode encoded according to the Code 39 standard.
Code: UPCA:	BarcodeEncodedAsUPCA:	Definition: Barcode encoded according to the UPCA standard.
Code: C025:	BarcodeEncodedAsCode25:	Definition: Barcode encoded according to the Code 25 standard.
Code: C128:	BarcodeEncodedAsCode128:	Definition: Barcode encoded according to the Code 128 standard.
Code: P417:	BarcodeEncodedAsPDF417:	Definition: Barcode encoded according to the PDF417 standard.
Code: COQR:	BarcodeEncodedAs2DQRCode:	Definition: Barcode encoded according to the 2Dimensions Quick Response Code Standard.

BusinessArea2Code.description:
Specifies the business context of the transaction
Code: PPAY:	PlainPayment:	Definition: The card is used to perform a plain payment.
Code: OPMT:	Openpayment:	Definition: The card is used in a Transit business case where the fare amount is not known when the transaction is initiated.
Code: TKNF:	TransitKnownFare:	Definition: The card is used in a Transit business case where the fare amount is known when the transaction is initiated.
Code: AIBD:	ArtificialIntelligenceBasedDecision:	Definition: The payment is initiated by an artificial intelligence based decision.
Code: EOPT:	EnergyOpenPayment:	Definition: Indicates when the card is used in an energy business case where the amount could not be assessed when the transaction is initiated.
Code: TOPT:	TransitOpenPayment:	Definition: Indicates when the card is used in a transit business case where the fare amount is not known when the transaction is initiated.

BytePadding1Code.description:
Byte padding for a cypher block chaining mode encryption, if the padding is not implicit.
Code: LNGT:	LengthPadding:	Definition: Message to encrypt is completed by a byte value containing the total number of added bytes.
Code: NUL8:	Null80Padding:	Definition: Message to encrypt is completed by one bit of value 1, followed by null bits until the encryption block length is reached.
Code: NULG:	NullLengthPadding:	Definition: Message to encrypt is completed by null byte values, the last byte containing the total number of added bytes.
Code: NULL:	NullPadding:	Definition: Message to encrypt is completed by null bytes.
Code: RAND:	RandomPadding:	Definition: Message to encrypt is completed by random value, the last byte containing the total number of added bytes.

CardAccountType3Code.description:
Type of cardholder account used for the transaction.
Code: DFLT:	Default:	Definition: Default account.
Code: SVNG:	Savings:	Definition: Savings account.
Code: CHCK:	Checking:	Definition: Checking account.
Code: CRDT:	CreditCard:	Definition: Credit card account.
Code: UVRL:	Universal:	Definition: Universal account.
Code: INVS:	Investment:	Definition: Investment account.
Code: EPRS:	EpurseCard:	Definition: Electronic purse card account.
Code: CTDP:	CertificateOfDeposit:	Definition: Certificate of deposit saving account.
Code: CURR:	Current:	Definition: Current account.
Code: CDBT:	DebitCard:	Definition: Debit card account.
Code: HEQL:	HomeEquityLoan:	Definition: Home equity loan credit account.
Code: ISTL:	InstalmentLoan:	Definition: Instalment loan credit account.
Code: LCDT:	LineOfCredit:	Definition: Line of credit account.
Code: MBNW:	MobilePhoneAccount:	Definition: Mobile Station Integrated Services Digital Network Number (MSISDN).
Code: MNMK:	MoneyMarket:	Definition: Money market saving account.
Code: MNMC:	MoneyMarketChecking:	Definition: Money market checking account.
Code: MTGL:	MortgageLoan:	Definition: Mortgage loan credit account.
Code: RTRM:	RetirementAccount:	Definition: Retirement account.
Code: RVLV:	RevolvingLoanAccount:	Definition: Revolving loan account.
Code: STBD:	StockOrBond:	Definition: Stock or bond investment account.
Code: PRPD:	PrePaid:	Definition: Pre-paid account.
Code: FLTC:	FleetCard:	Definition: Fleet card account.
Code: CASH:	Cash:	Definition: Cash as a source type  to perform the transaction.
Code: DBAC:	DebitAccount:	Definition: Account for debiting funds.
Code: CRAC:	CreditAccount:	Definition: Account for crediting funds.
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other type of account defined at national level.
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other type of account defined at private level.
Code: BENE:	Benefit:	Definition: Benefit account type

CardDataReading5Code.description:
Type of reading of the card data.
Code: TAGC:	Tag:	Definition: Tag reading capabilities (RFID, etc.).
Code: PHYS:	Physical:	Definition: Keyboard entry or OCR reading of embossing or printed data, either at time of transaction or after the event.
Code: BRCD:	BarCode:	Definition: Bar code.
Code: MGST:	MagneticStripe:	Definition: Magnetic stripe.
Code: CICC:	ICC:	Definition: ICC (Integrated Circuit Card) with contact containing software applications conform to ISO 7816.
Code: DFLE:	AccountData:	Definition: Account data on file.
Code: CTLS:	ProximityReader:	Definition: Contactless proximity reader.
Code: ECTL:	EMVProximityReader:	Definition: Contactless proximity reader, with application conform to the standard EMV (standard initiated by Europay, Mastercard and Visa).
Code: CDFL:	CardOnFile:	Definition: Card information are stored on a file.
Code: UNKW:	Unknown:	Definition: Unknown card reading capability.
Code: SICC:	SynchronousIntegratedCircuitCard:	Definition: Synchronous ICC - (Integrated Circuit Card) with contact.
Code: ICCY:	ICCContact:	Definition: ICC contact capability
Code: ICPY:	ICCProximity:	Definition: ICC contactless proximity
Code: MICR:	MagneticInkCharacterRecognition:	Definition: Recognition of magnetic ink characters
Code: MLEY:	ManualEntry:	Definition: Manual, no terminal used.
Code: MSIP:	MSIProximity:	Definition: Magstripe image contactless proximity
Code: OCRR:	OpticalCharacterRecognition:	Definition: OCR either at time of transaction or after the event.
Code: OPTC:	OpticalCode:	Definition: Optical coded reading capabilities (e.g. barcode, QR code, etc.)
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other national capability type assigned at national level.
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other card reading capability assigned on a private basis.
Code: RFID:	RFIDTag:	Definition: Radio Frequency Identification tag capabilities.
Code: UNSP:	Unspecified:	Definition: Unspecified capability.
Code: KEEN:	KeyEntered:	Definition: Key entered.
Code: QRCD:	QRCode:	Definition: Quick response code.
Code: CAMR:	Camera:	Definition: Card details captured via camera.
Code: MBNK:	MobileBankingApplication:	Definition: Card details were obtained via a mobile banking application.
Code: TOKN:	Token:	Definition: Card details were obtained via a token.

CardFallback1Code.description:
Information about card entry mode fallback.
Code: NFLB:	NoFallback:	Definition: No card fall-back during the transaction in progress.
Code: SFLB:	FallbackAfterSuccess:	Definition: Card fall-back occurred during the transaction in progress. The previous transaction on the terminal was successful.
Code: FFLB:	FallbackAfterFailure:	Definition: Card fall-back occurred during the transaction in progress. The previous transaction on the terminal failed.

CardIdentificationType1Code.description:
Type of account identification.
Code: CPAN:	PrimaryAccountNumber:	Definition: Standard card identification (card number).
Code: ISO2:	ISOTrack2:	Definition: ISO Track 2 including identification.
Code: BARC:	BarCode:	Definition: Bar-code with a specific form of identification.
Code: ACCT:	AccountNumber:	Definition: Account identification.
Code: PHON:	PhoneNumber:	Definition: A phone number identifies the account on which the phone card is assigned.
Code: UUID:	UniversalUniqueIdentification:	Definition: A Universal Unique Identification code is set for identification.
Code: PRIV:	PrivativeNumbering:	Definition: An identification set by a privative application.

CardPaymentServiceType12Code.description:
Main service provided during the card payment transaction.
Code: CAFT:	CardsFundTransfer:	Definition: Transfer of funds to and/or from a card account.
Code: ORCR:	OriginalCredit:	Definition: Original credit.
Code: CRDP:	CardPayment:	Definition: Card payment.
Code: CSHB:	CashBack:	Definition: Card payment with cash-back.
Code: CSHW:	CashAdvance:	Definition: Cash advance or withdrawals on a POI (Point Of Interaction), or at a bank counter.

Code: DEFR:	DeferredPayment:	Definition: Deferred payment.
Code: RESA:	Reservation:	Definition: Reservation (pre-authorisation).

Code: QUCH:	QuasiCash:	Definition: Quasi-cash.
Code: BALC:	Balance:	Definition: Balance enquiry.
Code: CACT:	CardActivation:	Definition: Card activation.
Code: CAVR:	CardVerification:	Definition: Card verification.
Code: PINC:	PINChange:	Definition: PIN (Personal Identification Number) change.
Code: VALC:	ValidityCheck:	Definition: Card validity check.
Code: AGGR:	Aggregation:	Definition: Aggregation of low payments.
Code: DCCV:	DCC:	Definition: Dynamic currency conversion (DCC).
Code: GRTT:	Gratuity:	Definition: Card payment with gratuity.
Code: INSP:	Instalment:	Definition: Instalment payment.
Code: LOYT:	Loyalty:	Definition: Loyalty services.
Code: NRES:	NoShow:	Definition: No show after reservation.

Code: UNAF:	UnsolicitedAvailableFunds:	Definition: Unsolicited available funds.
Code: VCAU:	VoiceAuthorisation:	Definition: Voice authorisation.
Code: IRES:	InitialReservation:	Definition: Initial reservation.
Code: URES:	UpdateReservation:	Definition: Update reservation.
Code: PRES:	PaymentReservation:	Definition: Payment after reservation.
Code: ARES:	AdditionalPayment:	Definition: Additional payment after reservation.
Code: FREC:	FirstRecurring:	Definition: Initial recurring payment.
Code: RREC:	FollowingRecurring:	Definition: Repeat recurring payment.
Code: TP2B:	PersonToBusiness:	Definition: Card payment transaction transfer from person to business.
Code: TP2P:	PersonToPerson:	Definition: Card payment transaction transfer from person to person.
Code: INSA:	AcceptorInstalment:	Definition: Instalment payment transaction performed by the acceptor or the acquirer.
Code: INSI:	IssuerInstalment:	Definition: Instalment payment transaction performed by the card issuer.
Code: UNLD:	Unloading:	Definition: Unloading non-financial account.
Code: CAFH:	CardsFundTransferPush:	Definition: Transfer of funds to a card or an account.
Code: CAFL:	CardsFundTransferPull:	Definition: Transfer of funds from a card or an account.
Code: CHWD:	CashWithdrawal:	Definition: Withdrawal of cash on an ATM.
Code: PINU:	PINUnblock:	Definition: Unblock the cardholder PIN.
Code: CSWD:	ChosenWithdrawal:	Definition: Amount and notes values are chosen by the customer.
Code: AUWS:	PreAuthorisedWithdrawal:	Definition: Withdrawal transaction was pre-authorised by another channel (amount could be absent).
Code: PFWD:	ProfileWithdrawal:	Definition: Amount and Notes Values are pre-defined by the customer profile.
Code: SDWD:	StandardWithdrawal:	Definition: Customer pressed a button associated with a withdrawal of unique amount and notes mix.
Code: TFBL:	TransferCardBillPayment:	Definition: Transfer for payment of bills.
Code: TFCS:	TransferFromCash:	Definition: Transfer from cash deposit.
Code: TFCH:	TransferFromCheque:	Definition: Transfer from cheque deposit.
Code: TFDB:	TransferFundsDisbursementGeneral:	Definition: Transfer for general disbursement.
Code: TFGD:	TransferGovernmentDisbursement:	Definition: Transfer for government disbursement.
Code: TFMD:	TransferMerchantDisbursement:	Definition: Transfer for merchant disbursement.
Code: TFPD:	TransferPayrollPensionDisbursement:	Definition: Transfer for payroll pension disbursement.
Code: NRFD:	NonRefundable:	Definition: Payment of goods or services which are not refundable, for instance low cost airline tickets.
Code: INST:	Instant:	Definition: Instant transaction.
Code: CADJ:	CreditAdjustement:	Definition: Credit adjustment to a previous transaction.
Code: DADJ:	DebitAdjustement:	Definition: Debit adjustment to a previous transaction.
Code: CRTC:	CreateCertificate:	Definition: Creation of an X.509 certificate with the public key and the information of the owner of the asymmetric key provided by the requestor.
Code: CRTR:	RenewCerificate:	Definition: Renewal of an X.509 certificate, protected by the certificate to renew.
Code: CRTK:	RevokeCertificate:	Definition: Revocation of an active X.509 certificate.
Code: WLSA:	AddWhiteList:	Definition: Add a POI in the white list of the terminal manager.
Code: WLSR:	RemoveWhiteList:	Definition: Remove a POI from the white list of the terminal manager.
Code: CIDD:	CardInitiatingDirectDebit:	Definition: Direct Debit initiated by Card.
Code: GOPT:	GuaranteeOfPayment:	Definition: Acceptor claims for guarantee of payment.

Code: INST:	Instant:	Definition: Instant transaction.
Code: CADJ:	CreditAdjustement:	Definition: Credit adjustment to a previous transaction.
Code: DADJ:	DebitAdjustement:	Definition: Debit adjustment to a previous transaction.
Code: CRTC:	CreateCertificate:	Definition: Creation of an X.509 certificate with the public key and the information of the owner of the asymmetric key provided by the requestor.
Code: CRTR:	RenewCerificate:	Definition: Renewal of an X.509 certificate, protected by the certificate to renew.
Code: CRTK:	RevokeCertificate:	Definition: Revocation of an active X.509 certificate.
Code: WLSA:	AddWhiteList:	Definition: Add a POI in the white list of the terminal manager.
Code: WLSR:	RemoveWhiteList:	Definition: Remove a POI from the white list of the terminal manager.
Code: CIDD:	CardInitiatingDirectDebit:	Definition: Direct Debit initiated by Card.
Code: GOPT:	GuaranteeOfPayment:	Definition: Acceptor claims for guarantee of payment.

CardProductType1Code.description:
Type of card product.
Code: COMM:	CommercialCard:	Definition: Cards issued as a means of business expenditure, for instance business card or corporate card. The user could be a company, an individual for business expenses or a self employed for business purposes.
Code: CONS:	ConsumerCard:	Definition: Cards issued as a means of personal expenditure. The user is always an individual.

CardholderVerificationCapability4Code.description:
Cardholder verification capabilities by the terminal.
Code: MNSG:	ManualSignature:	Definition: Manual signature verification.
Code: NPIN:	OnLinePIN:	Definition: Online PIN (Personal Identification Number).
Code: FCPN:	OfflinePINClear:	Definition: Offline PIN in clear (Personal Identification Number).
Code: FEPN:	OfflinePINEncrypted:	Definition: Offline PIN encrypted (Personal Identification Number).
Code: FDSG:	OfflineDigitalSignature:	Definition: Offline digital signature analysis.
Code: FBIO:	OfflineBiometrics:	Definition: Offline biometrics.
Code: MNVR:	ManualVerification:	Definition: Other manual verification, for example passport or drivers license.
Code: FBIG:	OfflineBiographics:	Definition: Offline biographics.
Code: APKI:	AccountDigitalSignature:	Definition: Account based digital signature.
Code: PKIS:	PKISignature:	Definition: PKI (Public Key Infrastructure) based digital signature.
Code: CHDT:	CardholderData:	Definition: Cardholder authentication data.
Code: SCEC:	SecureElectronicCommerce:	Definition: Three domain secure (three domain secure authentication of the cardholder).
Code: UNKW:	Unknown:	Definition: Unknown cardholder verification capability.
Code: PCOD:	PersonalCode:	Definition: Personal code of the customer for banking services.
Code: NOVF:	NoCapabilities:	Definition: No cardholder verification capability.
Code: NBIO:	OnLineBiometrics:	Definition: Online biometrics.
Code: OTHR:	Other:	Definition: Other cardholder verification capabilities.
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other type of cardholder verification defined at national level
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other type of cardholder verification defined in a private manner.
Code: SIGN:	Signature:	Definition: Handwritten signature verification
Code: UNSP:	Unspecified:	Definition: Cardholder verification capability unspecified.
Code: VORN:	VoiceRecognition:	Definition: Recognition by voice.
Code: NOPN:	NoPINEntry:	Definition: Device has no pin entry capability.
Code: NOOP:	NoOnLinePINEntry:	Definition: Device has no online pin entry capability.

CheckType1Code.description:
Type of bank check.
Code: PERS:	PersonalCheck:	Definition: The check belongs to an individual.
Code: BUSI:	BusinessCheck:	Definition: The check belongs to a Company or a professional entity.
Code: BANK:	BankCheck:	Definition: The check is guaranteed by a bank.
Code: PAYR:	PayrollCheck:	Definition: Check issued by a company for the employees.
Code: GOVC:	GovernmentCheck:	Definition: Check issued by Government.

ContentType2Code.description:
Identification of the type of a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) data structure.
Code: DATA:	PlainData:	Definition: Generic, non cryptographic, or unqualified data content - (ASN.1 Object Identifier: id-data).
Code: SIGN:	SignedData:	Definition: Digital signature - (ASN.1 Object Identifier: id-signedData).
Code: EVLP:	EnvelopedData:	Definition: Encrypted data, with encryption key - (ASN.1 Object Identifier: id-envelopedData).
Code: DGST:	DigestedData:	Definition: Message digest - (ASN.1 Object Identifier: id-digestedData).
Code: ECRP:	EncryptedData:	Definition: Encrypted data - (ASN.1 Object Identifier: id-encryptedData).
Code: AUTH:	AuthenticatedData:	Definition: MAC (Message Authentication Code), with encryption key - (ASN.1 Object Identifier: id-ct-authData).
Code: IFSE:	ISOFinancialServicesDataEncryption:	Definition: General data encryption that conforms to the ISO 13492 standard.

CryptographicKeyType3Code.description:
Codes for qualifying the type of cryptographic keys.
Code: DESC:	DES:	Definition: Data encryption standard.
Code: AESC:	AES:	Definition: Advanced encryption standard.
Code: RSAC:	RSA:	Definition: Rivest, Shamir and Adleman.
Code: ECCC:	ECC:	Definition: Elliptic-curve cryptography.
Code: AES2:	AES128:	Definition: AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) 128 bits cryptographic key as defined by the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS 197 - November 6, 2001 - Advanced Encryption Standard).
Code: EDE3:	DES112:	Definition: Data encryption standard key of 112 bits (without the parity bits).
Code: DKP9:	DUKPT2009:	Definition: DUKPT (Derived Unique Key Per Transaction) key, as specified in ANSI X9.24-2009 Annex A.
Code: AES9:	AES192:	Definition: AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) encryption with a 192 bits cryptographic key as defined by the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS 197 – November 6, 2001 - Advanced Encryption Standard).
Code: AES5:	AES256:	Definition: AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) encryption with a 256 bits cryptographic key as defined by the Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS 197 – November 6, 2001 - Advanced Encryption Standard).
Code: EDE4:	DES168:	Definition: Data encryption standard key of 168 bits (without the parity bits).
Code: APPL:	Application:	Definition: Key used to protect application information.
Code: DYNC:	Dynamic:	Definition: Any cryptographic key that can be downloaded.
Code: DATA:	Data:	Definition: Key used to protect data in the messages.
Code: KENC:	KeyEncryption:	Definition: Key used to encrypt other keys.
Code: WRKG:	Working:	Definition: Temporary key used to download keys.
Code: PINK:	PIN:	Definition: Key used to encrypt a PIN.
Code: MACK:	MAC:	Definition: Key used to generate the MAC of a message.
Code: DKAE:	DUKPTAES:	Definition: DUKPT AES (Derived Unique Key Per Transaction) algorithm.
Code: UKPT:	UKPT:	Definition: UKPT (Unique Key Per Transaction). Encryption key using Triple DES for encryption with a double length key (112 bits). FIPS PUB 46-3.
Code: UKA8:	UKPTAES128:	Definition: UKPT (Unique Key Per Transaction). Encryption key using AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) with a 128 bits length key. 
FIPS 197 - 6 November 2001).
Code: UKA6:	UKPTAES256:	Definition: UKPT (Unique Key Per Transaction). Encryption key using AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) with a  256 bits length key. 
FIPS 197 - 6 November 2001).
Code: ISKW:	ISO20038KeyWrap:	Definition: ISO 20038 - Banking and related financial services - Key wrap using symmetric keys. Method using symmetric keys as the wrapping algorithm.

CurrencyConversionResponse3Code.description:
Result of a requested currency conversion.
Code: IMER:	InvalidMerchant:	Definition: The card acceptor has not been recognised.
Code: ICRD:	InvalidCard:	Definition: The card is not valid for dynamic currency conversion.
Code: IPRD:	InvalidProduct:	Definition: Dynamic currency conversion service cannot be offered for this card product.
Code: IRAT:	NoRate:	Definition: Exchange rates are not available.
Code: ODCC:	Allowed:	Definition: Dynamic currency conversion may be offered to the cardholder.
Code: DCCA:	Assumed:	Definition: Transaction authorised with dynamic currency conversion.
Code: NDCC:	NotAvailable:	Definition: Dynamic currency conversion is not available for other reason.
Code: IATM:	InvalidATM:	Definition: The ATM is not valid for dynamic currency conversion.
Code: IAMG:	InvalidATMManager:	Definition: The ATM manager is not valid for dynamic currency conversion.
Code: REST:	Restriction:	Definition: Conversion accepted for the requested amount exclusively.
Code: CATG:	Catalogue:	Definition: Conversion accepted for a range of amounts.

DocumentType7Code.description:
Specifies a type of financial or commercial document.
Code: MSIN:	MeteredServiceInvoice:	Definition: Document is an invoice claiming payment for the supply of metered services, for example gas or electricity supplied to a fixed meter.
Code: CNFA:	CreditNoteRelatedToFinancialAdjustment:	Definition: Document is a credit note for the final amount settled for a commercial transaction.
Code: DNFA:	DebitNoteRelatedToFinancialAdjustment:	Definition: Document is a debit note for the final amount settled for a commercial transaction.
Code: CINV:	CommercialInvoice:	Definition: Document is an invoice.
Code: CREN:	CreditNote:	Definition: Document is a credit note.
Code: DEBN:	DebitNote:	Definition: Document is a debit note.
Code: HIRI:	HireInvoice:	Definition: Document is an invoice for the hiring of human resources or renting goods or equipment.
Code: SBIN:	SelfBilledInvoice:	Definition: Document is an invoice issued by the debtor.
Code: RADM:	RemittanceAdviceMessage:	Definition: Document is a remittance advice sent separately from the current transaction.
Code: RPIN:	RelatedPaymentInstruction:	Definition: Document is a linked payment instruction to which the current payment instruction is related, for example, in a cover scenario.
Code: CMCN:	CommercialContract:	Definition: Document is an agreement between the parties, stipulating the terms and conditions of the delivery of goods or services.
Code: FXDR:	ForeignExchangeDealReference:	Definition: Document is a pre-agreed or pre-arranged foreign exchange transaction to which the payment transaction refers.
Code: SOAC:	StatementOfAccount:	Definition: Document is a statement of the transactions posted to the debtor's account at the supplier.
Code: DISP:	DispatchAdvice:	Definition: Document is a dispatch advice.
Code: PUOR:	PurchaseOrder:	Definition: Document is a purchase order.
Code: SCOR:	StructuredCommunicationReference:	Definition: Document is a structured communication reference provided by the creditor to identify the referred transaction.
Code: BOLD:	BillOfLading:	Definition: Document is a shipping notice.
Code: VCHR:	Voucher:	Definition: Document is an electronic payment document.
Code: AROI:	AccountReceivableOpenItem:	Definition: Document is a payment that applies to a specific source document.
Code: TSUT:	TradeServicesUtilityTransaction:	Definition: Document is a transaction identifier as assigned by the Trade Services Utility.
Code: HRCP:	CashierReceipt:	Definition: When the Sale system print the Cashier copy of the Payment receipt.
Code: CRCP:	CustomerReceipt:	Definition: When the Sale System requires	the POI system to print the Customer receipt.
Code: JNRL:	Journal:	Definition: When the POI or the Sale System wants to store a message on the journal printer or electronic journal of the Sale Terminal (it is sometimes a Sale Logging/Journal Printer).
Code: SRCP:	SaleReceipt:	Definition: When the Sale System requires the POI system to print the Sale receipt.

EncryptionFormat2Code.description:
Format of data before encryption, if the format is not plaintext or implicit.
Code: TR31:	TR31:	Definition: Format of a cryptographic key specified by the ANSI X9 TR-31 standard.
Code: TR34:	TR34:	Definition: Format of a cryptographic key specified by the ANSI X9 TR-34 standard.
Code: I238:	ISO20038KeyWrap:	Definition: Format of a cryptographic key specified by the ISO20038 standard.
Code: CBCE:	CBC:	Definition: Cipher Block Chaining mode of encryption
Code: CTCE:	CTCE:	Definition: CTC encryption mode.

Exemption1Code.description:
Strong customer authentication exemption.
Code: MINT:	MerchantInitiatedTransaction:	Definition: Transaction is initiated by the Card Acceptor.
Code: RECP:	RecurringPayment:	Definition: Transaction is one of a series of recurring payment.
Code: LOWA:	LowAmountExemption:	Definition: Transaction's amount is low and could be processed without strong customer authentication.
Code: TRAE:	TransactionRiskAnalysisExemption:	Definition: According to the transaction risk analysis the strong customer authentication is not mandated.
Code: TMBE:	TrustedMerchantBeneficiaryExemption:	Definition: Cardholder has enrolled the Card Acceptor in the exemption list of strong customer authentication.
Code: SCAD:	StrongCustomerAuthenticationDelegation:	Definition: Card Acceptor is a strong customer authentication delegate.
Code: SCPE:	SecureCorporatePaymentExemption:	Definition: Transaction is a secure corporate payment.
Code: PKGE:	TransportFareOrParkingFeeUnattendedPaymentExemption:	Definition: Payment is processed in a environment where strong customer authentication is inappropriate.
Code: PAAC:	PaymentAccountExemption:	Definition: Payment account information exemption.
Code: CTLS:	ContactlessExemption:	Definition: Contactless payment at point of sale exemption.
Code: TRSP:	TransferSamePersonExemption:	Definition: Credit transfer between accounts held by the same natural or legal person exemption.

Frequency3Code.description:
Specifies the regularity of an event.
Code: YEAR:	Annual:	Definition: Event takes place every year or once a year.
Code: MNTH:	Monthly:	Definition: Event takes place every month or once a month.
Code: QURT:	Quarterly:	Definition: Event takes place every three months or four times a year.
Code: MIAN:	SemiAnnual:	Definition: Event takes place every six months or two times a year.
Code: WEEK:	Weekly:	Definition: Event takes place once a week.
Code: DAIL:	Daily:	Definition: Event takes place every day.
Code: ADHO:	Adhoc:	Definition: Event takes place on request or as necessary.
Code: INDA:	IntraDay:	Definition: Event takes place several times a day.
Code: OVNG:	Overnight:	Definition: Event takes place overnight.
Code: TEND:	TenDays:	Definition: Event takes place every ten business days.
Code: FRTN:	Fortnightly:	Definition: Event takes place every two weeks.
Code: MOVE:	TriggeredByMovement:	Definition: Event takes place at the end of the day if there was a movement on the account, otherwise nothing is sent that day.
Code: NEVR:	Never:	Definition: Event does never take place.
Code: RATE:	Rate:	Definition: Event takes place based on a change of a rate.
Code: CRED:	OnCreditEvent:	Definition: Event occurs due to a credit event occurring for an issuer.
Code: UPFR:	Upfront:	Definition: Event that takes place at the initiation of a trade or agreement.
Code: EXPI:	OnExpiry:	Definition: Event occurs on expiry of a financial contract.
Code: HOUL:	Hourly:	Definition: Event takes place every hours.
Code: TRIL:	TriAnnual:	Definition: Event takes place every four months or three times a year.
Code: BIMN:	Bimonthly:	Definition: Event takes place every two months or six times a year.
Code: ODMD:	OnDemand:	Definition: Event takes place on demand.
Code: SHFT:	Shift:	Definition: Event associated with a shift.
Code: TWWK:	TwiceAWeek:	Definition: Two times a week

GracePeriodUnitType1Code.description:
Contains the details of the grace period applicable to the instalment.
Code: MNTH:	Months:	Definition: Grace period months.
Code: PMTS:	Payments:	Definition: Grace period payments.
Code: DAYS:	Days:	Definition: Grace period days.
Code: WEKS:	Weeks:	Definition: Grace period weeks.
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other National Grace period.
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other Private Grace period.

InformationQualify1Code.description:
Qualification of the information to sent to an output logical device, to display or print to the Cashier or the Customer.
Code: STAT:	Status:	Definition: The information is a new state on which the message sender is entering. For instance, during a payment, the POI could display to the Cashier that POI request an authorisation to the host acquirer.
Code: ERRO:	Error:	Definition: The information is related to an error situation occurring on the message sender.
Code: DISP:	Display:	Definition: Standard display interface.
Code: SOND:	Sound:	Definition: Standard sound interface.
Code: INPT:	Input:	Definition: Answer to a question or information to be entered by the Cashier or the Customer, at the request of the POI Terminal or the Sale Terminal.
Code: POIR:	POIReplication:	Definition: Information displayed on the Cardholder POI interface, replicated on the Cashier interface.
Code: CUSA:	CustomerAssistance:	Definition: Input of the Cardholder POI interface which can be entered by the Cashier to assist the Customer.
Code: RCPT:	Receipt:	Definition: Where you print the Payment receipt that could be located on the Sale System or in some cases a restricted Sale ticket on the POI Terminal.
Code: DOCT:	Document:	Definition: When the POI System wants to print specific document (check, dynamic currency conversion ...). Used by the Sale System when the printer is not located on the Sale System.
Code: VCHR:	Voucher:	Definition: Coupons, voucher or special ticket generated by the POI or the Sale System and to be printed.

InstalmentAmountDetailsType1Code.description:
Contains the details of the grace period applicable to the instalment.
Code: INSU:	Insurance:	Definition: Insurance amount
Code: RQST:	Requested:	Definition: Requested amount
Code: TAXX:	Tax:	Definition: Instalment amount tax
Code: EXPN:	Expense:	Definition: Expense Amount
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Grace period unit type
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Grace period unit type
Code: OTHC:	OtherCharges:	Definition: Other amounts
Code: FUNA:	Funded:	Definition: Funded amount
Code: FEES:	Fees:	Definition: Fees amount
Code: AFCO:	AnnualFinancingCost:	Definition: Total financing cost per annum.
Code: INTR:	Interest:	Definition: Interest amount.
Code: PRNC:	Principal:	Definition: Principal amount.

InstalmentPeriod1Code.description:
Instalment period.
Code: MNTH:	Monthly:	Definition: Monthly instalment period.
Code: ANNU:	Annual:	Definition: Annual instalment period.

InstalmentPlan1Code.description:
Type of instalment plan.
Code: EQPM:	EqualPayment:	Definition: The payment is split in several instalments of equal amounts.
Code: NQPM:	InequalPayment:	Definition: The payment is split in several instalments of different amounts.
Code: DFRI:	DeferredInstalment:	Definition: The first instalment is deferred.

InterestRate1Code.description:
Contains the list of interest rates.
Code: GSRT:	GrossRate:	Definition: Gross interest rate of the instalment
Code: NTRT:	NetRate:	Definition: Net interest rate of the instalment
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other interest rate of the instalment
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other interest rate of the instalment

KeyUsage1Code.description:
Allowed usages of the key.
Code: ENCR:	Encryption:	Definition: Key may encrypt.
Code: DCPT:	Decryption:	Definition: Key may decrypt.
Code: DENC:	DataEncryption:	Definition: Key may encrypt data.
Code: DDEC:	DataDecryption:	Definition: Key may decrypt data.
Code: TRNX:	TranslateOutput:	Definition: Key may encrypt information after translation.
Code: TRNI:	TranslateInput:	Definition: Key may encrypt information before translation.
Code: MACG:	MessageAuthenticationCodeGeneration:	Definition: Key may generate message authentication codes (MAC).
Code: MACV:	MessageAuthenticationCodeVerification:	Definition: Key may verify message authentication codes (MAC).
Code: SIGG:	SignatureGeneration:	Definition: Key may generate digital signatures.
Code: SUGV:	SignatureVerification:	Definition: Key may verify digital signatures.
Code: PINE:	PINEncryption:	Definition: Key may encrypt personal identification numbers (PIN).
Code: PIND:	PINDecryption:	Definition: Key may decrypt personal identification numbers (PIN).
Code: PINV:	PINVerification:	Definition: Key may verify personal identification numbers (PIN).
Code: KEYG:	KeyGeneration:	Definition: Key may generate keys.
Code: KEYI:	KeyImport:	Definition: Key may import keys.
Code: KEYX:	KeyExport:	Definition: Key may export keys.
Code: KEYD:	KeyDerivation:	Definition: Key may derive keys.

LocationCategory3Code.description:
Indicates the type of integration of the POI terminal in the sale environment.
Code: ABRD:	Aboard:	Definition: Aboard is used when the sale is done in a vehicle (e.g a bus, train, ship, airplane,
taxi, etc).
Code: HOME:	Home:	Definition: Customer home.
Code: INDR:	Indoor:	Definition: Indoor terminal.
Code: IPMP:	InsidePump:	Definition: Terminal incorporated in the pump dispensing petrol.
Code: MOTO:	MailOrderTelephoneOrder:	Definition: Mail order or telephone order.
Code: MPOI:	MultiplePOITerminal:	Definition: Multiple terminals linked to a unique sale terminal.
Code: MPMP:	MultiplePump:	Definition: Outdoor terminal serving several petrol pumps.
Code: MSLE:	MultipleSaleTerminal:	Definition: Terminal serving multiple sale terminals.
Code: NMDC:	Nomadic:	Definition: Nomadic is used when the merchant is traveling to different locations (e.g fair or
sport events, home delivery, food truck).
Code: FIXD:	PhysicalShop:	Definition: Fixed location, for example in a shop.
Code: SSLE:	SingleSaleTerminal:	Definition: Terminal linked to a unique sale terminal.
Code: VNDG:	VendingMachine:	Definition: Terminal integrated in a vending machine.
Code: VIRT:	VirtualShop:	Definition: Virtual Shop is used for any ecommerce solution.

LocationCategory4Code.description:
Indicates the type of integration of the POI terminal in the sale environment.
Code: ABRD:	Aboard:	Definition: Aboard is used when the sale is done in a vehicle (e.g a bus, train, ship, airplane,
taxi, etc).
Code: HOME:	Home:	Definition: Customer home.
Code: INDR:	Indoor:	Definition: Indoor terminal.
Code: IPMP:	InsidePump:	Definition: Terminal incorporated in the pump dispensing petrol.
Code: MOTO:	MailOrderTelephoneOrder:	Definition: Mail order or telephone order.
Code: MPOI:	MultiplePOITerminal:	Definition: Multiple terminals linked to a unique sale terminal.
Code: MPMP:	MultiplePump:	Definition: Outdoor terminal serving several petrol pumps.
Code: MSLE:	MultipleSaleTerminal:	Definition: Terminal serving multiple sale terminals.
Code: NMDC:	Nomadic:	Definition: Nomadic is used when the merchant is traveling to different locations (e.g fair or
sport events, home delivery, food truck).
Code: FIXD:	PhysicalShop:	Definition: Fixed location, for example in a shop.
Code: SSLE:	SingleSaleTerminal:	Definition: Terminal linked to a unique sale terminal.
Code: VNDG:	VendingMachine:	Definition: Terminal integrated in a vending machine.
Code: VIRT:	VirtualShop:	Definition: Virtual Shop is used for any ecommerce solution.

LoyaltyHandling1Code.description:
Possible types of Loyalty processing.
Code: DENY:	Forbidden:	Definition: No loyalty card to read and loyalty transaction to process. 	Any attempt to enter a pure loyalty card is rejected.
Code: PRCS:	Processed:	Definition: The loyalty transaction is already processed, no loyalty card or loyalty transaction to process.
Code: ALLO:	Allowed:	Definition: The loyalty is accepted, but the POI has not to require or ask a loyalty card. The loyalty is involved by the payment card (e.g. an hybrid or linked card). 
Code: PROP:	Proposed:	Definition: The loyalty is accepted, and the POI has to ask a loyalty card. If the Customer does not enter a loyalty card, no loyalty transaction is realised.
Code: REQU:	Required:	Definition: The loyalty is required, and the POI refuses the processing 	of the message request if the cardholder does not enter a loyalty card.

MemoryUnit1Code.description:
Unit of the memory size.
Code: EXAB:	ExaByte:	Definition: Exa byte.
Code: PETA:	PetaByte:	Definition: Peta byte.
Code: TERA:	TeraByte:	Definition: Tera byte.
Code: GIGA:	GigaByte:	Definition: Giga byte.
Code: MEGA:	MegaByte:	Definition: Mega byte.
Code: KILO:	KiloByte:	Definition: Kilo byte.
Code: BYTE:	Byte:	Definition: Byte.

NetworkType1Code.description:
Type of communication network.
Code: IPNW:	InternetProtocol:	Definition: Protocol of an IP network.
Code: PSTN:	PublicTelephone:	Definition: Protocol of a Public Switched Telephone Network (PSTN).
Code: HTTP:	HTTP:	Definition: HTTP proxy.
Code: SCK4:	Sock4:	Definition: Sock4 proxy.
Code: SCK5:	Sock5:	Definition: Sock5 proxy.

OnLineCapability1Code.description:
On-line and off-line capabilities of the POI (Point Of Interaction).
Code: OFLN:	OffLine:	Definition: Off-line only capable.
Code: ONLN:	OnLine:	Definition: On-line only capable.
Code: SMON:	SemiOffLine:	Definition: Off-line capable with possible on-line requests to the acquirer.
Code: BOTH:	BothOnLineAndOffLine:	Definition: Both online and offline

OnLineReason2Code.description:
Reason to process an online authorisation.
Code: RNDM:	RandomSelection:	Definition: Transaction random selection to go online.
Code: ICCF:	ICCForced:	Definition: Payment application in the Integrated Circuit Card forces to go on-line.
Code: MERF:	MerchantForced:	Definition: On line forced by card acceptor.
Code: TRMF:	TerminalForced:	Definition: Terminal random selection to go online.
Code: ISSF:	IssuerForced:	Definition: On line forced by card issuer.
Code: FRLT:	FloorLimit:	Definition: Over floor limit.
Code: EXFL:	ExceptionFile:	Definition: Card appears on terminal exception file.
Code: TAMT:	TotalAmount:	Definition: Total amount of purchases per cardholder and per application above floor limit.
Code: CBIN:	ControlledBIN:	Definition: Bank Identification Number under control.
Code: UBIN:	UnknownBIN:	Definition: Unknown Bank Identification Number.
Code: CPAN:	ControlledPAN:	Definition: Primary account number (card number) under control.
Code: FLOW:	FlowControl:	Definition: Flow control.
Code: CRCY:	UnavailableCurrency:	Definition: Unknown currency code or foreign currency.
Code: IFPR:	IssuerForcedPINRequest:	Definition: Request Cardholder Authentication througth PIN insertion

Message format.

Code: MREF:	MessageReference:	Definition: Predefined configured messages, identified by a reference.
Code: HTML:	XHTML:	Definition: XHTML document which includes a subset of the XHTML output tag.
Code: SREF:	ScreenReference:	Definition: Screen to display identified by a reference.
Code: BARC:	Barcode:	Definition: Barcode to output in several possible format.
Code: MENT:	MenuEntry:	Definition: A text to display as a menu before requesting an input.
Code: FLNM:	FileName:	Definition: File name and location identification for stored messages or data.
Code: MMSI:	MultiMediaMessaging:	Definition: Multi-media messaging service
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other type of output of message defined at national level.
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other type of output format defined at private level.
Code: SMSI:	ShortMessageService:	Definition: Short message service
Code: URLI:	UniformResourceLocator:	Definition: Uniform Resource Locator (URL) reference for the message.
Code: PLIN:	PrintLine:	Definition: A formatted print line.
Code: JSON:	JSON:	Definition: Java Syntax Object Notation format.
Code: XMLF:	XML:	Definition: eXtensible Markup Language format.
Code: EDIF:	EDIFACT:	Definition: Electronic data interchange for administration, commerce and transport.
Code: CSVF:	CSV:	Definition: Comma separated value format.
Code: JPEG:	JPEG:	Definition: Joint Photographic Experts Group format.
Code: PDFF:	PDF:	Definition: Portable Document Format.
Code: PNGF:	PNG:	Definition: Portable Network Graphics format.
Code: SVGF:	SVG:	Definition: Scalable vector graphic format.

Type of output format.

Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other type of output format defined at private level.
Code: SMSI:	ShortMessageService:	Definition: Short message service
Code: URLI:	UniformResourceLocator:	Definition: Uniform Resource Locator (URL) reference for the message.
Code: PLIN:	PrintLine:	Definition: A formatted print line.
Code: JSON:	JSON:	Definition: Java Syntax Object Notation format.
Code: XMLF:	XML:	Definition: eXtensible Markup Language format.
Code: EDIF:	EDIFACT:	Definition: Electronic data interchange for administration, commerce and transport.
Code: CSVF:	CSV:	Definition: Comma separated value format.
Code: JPEG:	JPEG:	Definition: Joint Photographic Experts Group format.
Code: PDFF:	PDF:	Definition: Portable Document Format.
Code: PNGF:	PNG:	Definition: Portable Network Graphics format.
Code: SVGF:	SVG:	Definition: Scalable vector graphic format.

PINFormat3Code.description:
PIN (Personal Identification Number) format used before encryption.
Code: ISO0:	ISO0:	Definition: PIN diversified with the card account number, conforming to the standard ISO 9564-2.
Code: ISO1:	ISO1:	Definition: PIN completed with random padding characters, conforming to the standard ISO 9564-2.
Code: ISO2:	ISO2:	Definition: PIN without diversification characters, conforming to the standard ISO 9564-2.
Code: ISO3:	ISO3:	Definition: PIN diversified with the card account number and random characters, conforming to the standard ISO 9564-2.
Code: ISO4:	ISO4:	Definition: PIN format used with AES encryption, conforming to the new ISO SC2 format.
Code: ISO5:	ISO5:	Definition: Alternative PIN format used with AES encryption, conforming to the new ISO SC2 format.
Code: ANSI:	ANSI0:	Definition: ANSI 0 PIN block format.
Code: BNCM:	Bancomat:	Definition: Italian Bancomat PIN block format.
Code: BKSY:	Banksys:	Definition: Banksys PIN block format.
Code: DBLD:	Diebold:	Definition: Diebold PIN block format.
Code: DBLC:	DieboldCO:	Definition: Diebold CO PIN block format.
Code: ECI2:	ECI2:	Definition: ECI2 PIN block format.
Code: ECI3:	ECI3:	Definition: ECI3 PIN block format.
Code: EMVS:	EMVRSA:	Definition: EMV ISO2 PIN block format encrypted with the EMV RSA cryptographic key for the PIN.
Code: IBM3:	IBM3624:	Definition: IBM 3624 PIN block format.
Code: VIS2:	VISA2:	Definition: VISA2 PIN block format.
Code: VIS3:	VISA3:	Definition: VISA3 PIN block format.

POICommunicationType2Code.description:
Low level communication of the hardware or software component toward another component or an external entity.
Code: USBH:	USBHost:	Definition: Communication with a host from an USB port.
Code: USBD:	USBDevice:	Definition: Communication with a USB stick or any USB device.
Code: ETHR:	Ethernet:	Definition: Ethernet port to communicate.
Code: WIFI:	Wifi:	Definition: Wifi communication with another component.
Code: PSTN:	PSTN:	Definition: Communication with a host using Public Switching Telephone Network.
Code: BLTH:	Bluetooth:	Definition: Communication with a host using Bluetooth.
Code: GSMF:	GSM:	Definition: Communication with a host using GSM.
Code: GPRS:	GPRS:	Definition: Communication with a host using GPRS.
Code: RS23:	RS232:	Definition: Serial port to communicate.
Code: WT2G:	WirelessTechnology2G:	Definition: Includes all communication technologies which can be qualified as being part of the 2G technology (e.g EDGE or PDC).
Code: WT3G:	WirelessTechnology3G:	Definition: Includes all communication technologies which can be qualified as being part of the 3G technology.
Code: WT4G:	WirelessTechnology4G:	Definition: Includes all communication technologies which can be qualified as being part of the 4G technology.
Code: WT5G:	WirelessTechnology5G:	Definition: Includes all communication technologies which can be qualified as being part of the 5G technology.

POIComponentAssessment1Code.description:
Type of assessment of a POI component (Point of Interaction).
Code: EVAL:	Evaluation:	Definition: Evaluation by a lab or a tool.
Code: CERT:	Certification:	Definition: Certification number delivered by a certification body.
Code: APPL:	Approval:	Definition: Approval number delivered by an approval centre.

POIComponentStatus1Code.description:
Status of a component belonging to a POI Terminal (Point of Interaction).
Code: WAIT:	WaitingActivation:	Definition: Component not yet activated.
Code: OPER:	InOperation:	Definition: Component activated and in operation.
Code: OUTD:	OutOfOrder:	Definition: Component not working properly.
Code: DACT:	Deactivated:	Definition: Component has been deactivated.

POIComponentType6Code.description:
Type of component belonging to a POI (Point of Interaction) Terminal.
Code: SOFT:	Soft:	Definition: Payment or other software application.
Code: EMVK:	EMVKernel:	Definition: EMV application kernel (EMV is the chip card specifications initially defined by Eurocard, Mastercard and Visa).
Code: EMVO:	EMVLevel1:	Definition: EMV physical interface (EMV is the chip card specifications initially defined by Eurocard, Mastercard and Visa).
Code: MRIT:	MerchantInterface:	Definition: Merchant interface.
Code: CHIT:	CardholderInterface:	Definition: Cardholder Interface.
Code: SECM:	SecureModule:	Definition: Security module.
Code: PEDV:	PINEntryDevice:	Definition: Personal identification number (or PIN) entry device (PED).
Code: AQPR:	AcquirerParameters:	Definition: Acquirer specific configuration parameters for the point of interaction (POI) system.
Code: MRPR:	MerchantParameters:	Definition: Merchant configuration parameters for the point of interaction (POI).
Code: VDPR:	VendorParameters:	Definition: Point of interaction parameters defined by the manufacturer for instance the PIN verification capabilities.
Code: AQPP:	AcquirerProtocolParameters:	Definition: Parameters for acquirer interface of the point of interaction, including acquirer host configuration parameters.
Code: APPR:	ApplicationParameters:	Definition: Parameters of a payment application running on the point of interaction.
Code: DVCE:	Device:	Definition: Device sub-component of a component of the point of interaction.
Code: DRVR:	Driver:	Definition: Driver module of the point of interaction.
Code: MDWR:	Middleware:	Definition: Software module of the point of interaction.
Code: OPST:	OperatingSystem:	Definition: Software that manages hardware to provide common services to the applications.
Code: APLI:	PaymentApplication:	Definition: Payment application software.
Code: SCPR:	SecurityParameters:	Definition: Security parameters of the point of interaction.
Code: SERV:	Server:	Definition: Payment server of a point of interaction system.
Code: TERM:	Terminal:	Definition: Payment terminal point of interaction.
Code: TLPR:	TerminalParameters:	Definition: Manufacturer configuration parameters of the point of interaction.
Code: CRTF:	CertificateParameters:	Definition: Certificate provided by a terminal manager.
Code: TMSP:	TMSProtocolParameters:	Definition: Configuration parameters for the TMS protocol.
Code: SAPR:	SaleToPOIProtocolParameters:	Definition: Parameters related to the Sale to POI protocol.
Code: SACP:	SaleComponent:	Definition: Component of the Sale system.
Code: LOGF:	LogFile:	Definition: Any repository used for recording log traces.
Code: MDFL:	MediaFile:	Definition: Media file managed by an application of the POI.
Code: CONF:	ConfigurationFile:	Definition: Configuration file relevant for the POI.
Code: RPFL:	ReportFile:	Definition: Report file generated by the POI.

PartyType14Code.description:
Identification of the type of entity involved in a transaction.
Code: SALE:	SaleSystem:	Definition: Party selling goods and services.
Code: PCPT:	POIComponent:	Definition: Party component of a POI system or POI terminal (Point of Interaction).
Code: ISUR:	Issuer:	Definition: Issuer is the entitled party.
Code: HLDR:	Holder:	Definition: Holder is the entitled party.
Code: INVE:	Investor:	Definition: Party, either an individual or organisation, whose assets are being invested.
Code: EXEC:	ExecutingFirm:	Definition: Party that identifies an executing / give-up broker.
Code: BROK:	BrokerOfCredit:	Definition: Party that receives the trade credit.
Code: CORR:	CorrespondentClearingFirm:	Definition: Party that is going to carry the position on their books at another clearinghouse (exchanges).
Code: COFI:	ContraFirm:	Definition: Party that is the counterparty in a trade.
Code: COCL:	ContraClearingFirm:	Definition: Party that is the clearing firm of the counterparty in a trade.
Code: UNDE:	UnderlyingContraFirm:	Definition: Party (broker or other firm), which is the contra side of the trade for the underlying security.
Code: GIVE:	GiveUpClearingFirm:	Definition: Party to which the trade is given up (carries the position that results from a trade).
Code: ORDE:	OrderOriginationFirm:	Definition: Party that originates an order.
Code: SPON:	SponsoringFirm:	Definition: Party (member of an exchange)that is sponsoring an entering firm to send orders directly to the exchange.
Code: CLEA:	Clearingfirm:	Definition: Party (broker) that settles security transactions from another broker for a fee = take up broker.
Code: INTR:	IntroducingFirm:	Definition: Party that can relay an order directly to the trading floor, or give clients direct access to the floor. The introducing firm delegates the work of the floor operation, trade execution and accounting.
Code: ENTE:	EnteringFirm:	Definition: Party that has recorded or reported an execution of a trade. When an entering firm that is not a party to a trade enters the trade into a trade recording system, any inquiries can be directed to the appropriate source.
Code: CLIE:	Client:	Definition: A client is identified in third party-transactions or for investor in intermediary transactions.
Code: STEP:	StepInBroker:	Definition: Broker to which the investment manager directs the execution of a portion of the trade.
Code: AFFI:	AffirmingParty:	Definition: Party (buyer or seller) that positively affirms the details of a previously agreed security trade confirmation.
Code: ETC1:	ETCServiceProvider1:	Definition: Party acting as the Electronic Trade Confirmation (ETC) service provider 1.
Code: ETC2:	ETCServiceProvider2:	Definition: Party acting as the Electronic Trade Confirmation (ETC) service provider 2.
Code: RQBR:	RequestedBroker:	Definition: In a directed order, broker with which the Receiver of the message is requested to execute the order.
Code: TAXH:	TaxAuthority:	Definition: Tax authority.
Code: DLIS:	DelegateIssuer:	Definition: Party to whom the card issuer delegates to authorise card payment transactions.
Code: OPOI:	OriginatingPOI:	Definition: Point Of Interaction initiating the card payment transaction.
Code: CISS:	CardIssuer:	Definition: Party that issues cards.
Code: ACCP:	Acceptor:	Definition: Card acceptor, party accepting the card and presenting transaction data to the acquirer.
Code: MERC:	Merchant:	Definition: Merchant providing goods and service in the card payment transaction.
Code: ACQR:	Acquirer:	Definition: Entity acquiring card transactions.
Code: ITAG:	IntermediaryAgent:	Definition: Party acting on behalf of other parties to process or forward data to other parties.
Code: MTMG:	MasterTerminalManager:	Definition: Responsible for the maintenance of a card payment acceptance terminal.
Code: TMGT:	TerminalManager:	Definition: Responsible for one or several maintenance functions of a card payment acceptance terminal.
Code: ACQP:	AcquirerProcessor:	Definition: Entity providing acquiring card payment processing services on behalf on an acquirer.
Code: CISP:	CardIssuerProcessor:	Definition: Entity providing issuing card payment processing services on behalf on an issuer.
Code: CSCH:	CardScheme:	Definition: Entity defining rules and procedures for card payment transactions acting as an intermediary between an acquirer and an issuer.
Code: SCHP:	CardSchemeProcessor:	Definition: Entity providing card payment processing services acting on behalf of a card scheme.
Code: ATMG:	ATMManager:	Definition: Entity managing the ATM.
Code: HSTG:	HostingEntity:	Definition: Entity hosting the ATM.
Code: OATM:	OriginatingATM:	Definition: ATM initiating the transaction.
Code: OTRM:	OriginatingTerminal:	Definition: Application on the terminal which has initiated the transaction.
Code: ICCA:	CardApplication:	Definition: Application in the smart card.
Code: PSYS:	POISystem:	Definition: Configuration to apply to the whole POI system.
Code: PGRP:	POIGroup:	Definition: Configuration to apply to a subset of the whole POI system.
Code: PSNG:	SinglePOI:	Definition: Configuration to apply to a single POI terminal.
Code: BKAF:	AccountFromBank:	Definition: The bank of the source account.
Code: BKAT:	AccountToBank:	Definition: The bank of the destination account.
Code: AGNT:	Agent:	Definition: Entity providing card payment processing services acting as an intermediary between an acquirer and an issuer.
Code: CRDH:	Cardholder:	Definition: Holder of a payment card.
Code: CLRA:	ClearingAgent:	Definition: Agent in charge of clearing payment or related transactions.
Code: GVIU:	GovernmentInvestigationUnit:	Definition: Government organisation investigation unit. 
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other card payment entity type defined at national level
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other card payment entity type defined at private level
Code: PISP:	PaymentInitiationServiceProvider:	Definition: Payment Initiation Service Provider (PISP)
Code: PASP:	PaymentServiceProvider:	Definition: Entity provding payments services.
Code: POOI:	PointOfInteraction:	Definition: Party in charge of controlling or supervising a card acceptance Point of Interaction
Code: SETA:	SettlementAgent:	Definition: Agent in charge of the settlement of a payment or related transaction.
Code: WLPR:	WalletProvider:	Definition: Provider of an electronic wallet
