Code: MTMG:	MasterTerminalManager:	Definition: Responsible for the maintenance of a card payment acceptance terminal.
Code: TMGT:	TerminalManager:	Definition: Responsible for one or several maintenance functions of a card payment acceptance terminal.
Code: ACQP:	AcquirerProcessor:	Definition: Entity providing acquiring card payment processing services on behalf on an acquirer.
Code: CISP:	CardIssuerProcessor:	Definition: Entity providing issuing card payment processing services on behalf on an issuer.
Code: CSCH:	CardScheme:	Definition: Entity defining rules and procedures for card payment transactions acting as an intermediary between an acquirer and an issuer.
Code: SCHP:	CardSchemeProcessor:	Definition: Entity providing card payment processing services acting on behalf of a card scheme.
Code: ATMG:	ATMManager:	Definition: Entity managing the ATM.
Code: HSTG:	HostingEntity:	Definition: Entity hosting the ATM.
Code: OATM:	OriginatingATM:	Definition: ATM initiating the transaction.
Code: OTRM:	OriginatingTerminal:	Definition: Application on the terminal which has initiated the transaction.
Code: ICCA:	CardApplication:	Definition: Application in the smart card.
Code: PSYS:	POISystem:	Definition: Configuration to apply to the whole POI system.
Code: PGRP:	POIGroup:	Definition: Configuration to apply to a subset of the whole POI system.
Code: PSNG:	SinglePOI:	Definition: Configuration to apply to a single POI terminal.
Code: BKAF:	AccountFromBank:	Definition: The bank of the source account.
Code: BKAT:	AccountToBank:	Definition: The bank of the destination account.
Code: AGNT:	Agent:	Definition: Entity providing card payment processing services acting as an intermediary between an acquirer and an issuer.
Code: CRDH:	Cardholder:	Definition: Holder of a payment card.
Code: CLRA:	ClearingAgent:	Definition: Agent in charge of clearing payment or related transactions.
Code: GVIU:	GovernmentInvestigationUnit:	Definition: Government organisation investigation unit. 
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other card payment entity type defined at national level
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other card payment entity type defined at private level
Code: PISP:	PaymentInitiationServiceProvider:	Definition: Payment Initiation Service Provider (PISP)
Code: PASP:	PaymentServiceProvider:	Definition: Entity provding payments services.
Code: POOI:	PointOfInteraction:	Definition: Party in charge of controlling or supervising a card acceptance Point of Interaction
Code: SETA:	SettlementAgent:	Definition: Agent in charge of the settlement of a payment or related transaction.
Code: WLPR:	WalletProvider:	Definition: Provider of an electronic wallet

PartyType7Code.description:
Party that communicate with a POI component (Point of Interaction), using a communication device.
Code: SALE:	SaleSystem:	Definition: Party selling goods and services.
Code: PCPT:	POIComponent:	Definition: Party component of a POI system or POI terminal (Point of Interaction).
Code: ISUR:	Issuer:	Definition: Issuer is the entitled party.
Code: HLDR:	Holder:	Definition: Holder is the entitled party.
Code: INVE:	Investor:	Definition: Party, either an individual or organisation, whose assets are being invested.
Code: EXEC:	ExecutingFirm:	Definition: Party that identifies an executing / give-up broker.
Code: BROK:	BrokerOfCredit:	Definition: Party that receives the trade credit.
Code: CORR:	CorrespondentClearingFirm:	Definition: Party that is going to carry the position on their books at another clearinghouse (exchanges).
Code: COFI:	ContraFirm:	Definition: Party that is the counterparty in a trade.
Code: COCL:	ContraClearingFirm:	Definition: Party that is the clearing firm of the counterparty in a trade.
Code: UNDE:	UnderlyingContraFirm:	Definition: Party (broker or other firm), which is the contra side of the trade for the underlying security.
Code: GIVE:	GiveUpClearingFirm:	Definition: Party to which the trade is given up (carries the position that results from a trade).
Code: ORDE:	OrderOriginationFirm:	Definition: Party that originates an order.
Code: SPON:	SponsoringFirm:	Definition: Party (member of an exchange)that is sponsoring an entering firm to send orders directly to the exchange.
Code: CLEA:	Clearingfirm:	Definition: Party (broker) that settles security transactions from another broker for a fee = take up broker.
Code: INTR:	IntroducingFirm:	Definition: Party that can relay an order directly to the trading floor, or give clients direct access to the floor. The introducing firm delegates the work of the floor operation, trade execution and accounting.
Code: ENTE:	EnteringFirm:	Definition: Party that has recorded or reported an execution of a trade. When an entering firm that is not a party to a trade enters the trade into a trade recording system, any inquiries can be directed to the appropriate source.
Code: CLIE:	Client:	Definition: A client is identified in third party-transactions or for investor in intermediary transactions.
Code: STEP:	StepInBroker:	Definition: Broker to which the investment manager directs the execution of a portion of the trade.
Code: AFFI:	AffirmingParty:	Definition: Party (buyer or seller) that positively affirms the details of a previously agreed security trade confirmation.
Code: ETC1:	ETCServiceProvider1:	Definition: Party acting as the Electronic Trade Confirmation (ETC) service provider 1.
Code: ETC2:	ETCServiceProvider2:	Definition: Party acting as the Electronic Trade Confirmation (ETC) service provider 2.
Code: RQBR:	RequestedBroker:	Definition: In a directed order, broker with which the Receiver of the message is requested to execute the order.
Code: TAXH:	TaxAuthority:	Definition: Tax authority.
Code: DLIS:	DelegateIssuer:	Definition: Party to whom the card issuer delegates to authorise card payment transactions.
Code: OPOI:	OriginatingPOI:	Definition: Point Of Interaction initiating the card payment transaction.
Code: CISS:	CardIssuer:	Definition: Party that issues cards.
Code: ACCP:	Acceptor:	Definition: Card acceptor, party accepting the card and presenting transaction data to the acquirer.
Code: MERC:	Merchant:	Definition: Merchant providing goods and service in the card payment transaction.
Code: ACQR:	Acquirer:	Definition: Entity acquiring card transactions.
Code: ITAG:	IntermediaryAgent:	Definition: Party acting on behalf of other parties to process or forward data to other parties.
Code: MTMG:	MasterTerminalManager:	Definition: Responsible for the maintenance of a card payment acceptance terminal.
Code: TMGT:	TerminalManager:	Definition: Responsible for one or several maintenance functions of a card payment acceptance terminal.
Code: ACQP:	AcquirerProcessor:	Definition: Entity providing acquiring card payment processing services on behalf on an acquirer.
Code: CISP:	CardIssuerProcessor:	Definition: Entity providing issuing card payment processing services on behalf on an issuer.
Code: CSCH:	CardScheme:	Definition: Entity defining rules and procedures for card payment transactions acting as an intermediary between an acquirer and an issuer.
Code: SCHP:	CardSchemeProcessor:	Definition: Entity providing card payment processing services acting on behalf of a card scheme.
Code: ATMG:	ATMManager:	Definition: Entity managing the ATM.
Code: HSTG:	HostingEntity:	Definition: Entity hosting the ATM.
Code: OATM:	OriginatingATM:	Definition: ATM initiating the transaction.
Code: OTRM:	OriginatingTerminal:	Definition: Application on the terminal which has initiated the transaction.
Code: ICCA:	CardApplication:	Definition: Application in the smart card.
Code: PSYS:	POISystem:	Definition: Configuration to apply to the whole POI system.
Code: PGRP:	POIGroup:	Definition: Configuration to apply to a subset of the whole POI system.
Code: PSNG:	SinglePOI:	Definition: Configuration to apply to a single POI terminal.
Code: BKAF:	AccountFromBank:	Definition: The bank of the source account.
Code: BKAT:	AccountToBank:	Definition: The bank of the destination account.
Code: AGNT:	Agent:	Definition: Entity providing card payment processing services acting as an intermediary between an acquirer and an issuer.
Code: CRDH:	Cardholder:	Definition: Holder of a payment card.
Code: CLRA:	ClearingAgent:	Definition: Agent in charge of clearing payment or related transactions.
Code: GVIU:	GovernmentInvestigationUnit:	Definition: Government organisation investigation unit. 
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other card payment entity type defined at national level
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other card payment entity type defined at private level
Code: PISP:	PaymentInitiationServiceProvider:	Definition: Payment Initiation Service Provider (PISP)
Code: PASP:	PaymentServiceProvider:	Definition: Entity provding payments services.
Code: POOI:	PointOfInteraction:	Definition: Party in charge of controlling or supervising a card acceptance Point of Interaction
Code: SETA:	SettlementAgent:	Definition: Agent in charge of the settlement of a payment or related transaction.
Code: WLPR:	WalletProvider:	Definition: Provider of an electronic wallet

PlanOwner1Code.description:
Contains list of plan owners
Code: ACQR:	Acquirer:	Definition: Plan owner is an acquirer.
Code: ACCP:	Acceptor:	Definition: Plan owner is an acceptor.
Code: ISSR:	Issuer:	Definition: Plan owner is an issuer.
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: plan owner type is other national.
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: plan owner type is other private.

QRCodeEncodingMode1Code.description:
Encoding Mode of Quick Response Code.
Code: NUME:	Numeric:	Definition: Numeric value provided in Barcode field.
Code: ALFA:	Alphanumeric:	Definition: Alphanumeric value provided in Barcode field.
Code: BINA:	Binary:	Definition: Binary value provided in Quick Response Code Binary Value.
Code: KANJ:	Kanji:	Definition: Kanji value provided in Quick Response Code Binary Value.

QRCodeErrorCorrection1Code.description:
Error Correction mode of Quick Response Code.
Code: L007:	ErrorCorrection7Percent:	Definition: Reed-Solomon error correction  7%
Code: M015:	ErrorCorrection15Percent:	Definition: Reed-Solomon error correction 15%
Code: Q025:	ErrorCorrection25Percent:	Definition: Reed-Solomon error correction 25%
Code: H030:	ErrorCorrection30Percent:	Definition: Reed-Solomon error correction 30%

Response11Code.description:
Result of the processing of the message
Code: DECL:	Declined:	Definition: Service is declined.
Code: APPR:	Approved:	Definition: Service has been successfuly provided.
Code: PART:	PartialApproved:	Definition: Service has been partialy provided.
Code: TECH:	TechnicalError:	Definition: Service cannot be provided for technical reason (eg timeout contacting the Issuer, security problem).
Code: FRTH:	FurtherAction:	Definition: Further action required to complete the transaction, for instance a referral.
Code: UNPR:	NotProcessed:	Definition: Advice message could not be processed.
Code: PRCS:	Processed:	Definition: Advice message is processed.
Code: FAIL:	Failure:	Definition: Processing of the request fails for various reasons. Some further processing according to the type of requested service, the context of the process, and some additional precision about the failure notified in the ErrorCondition data element.
Code: SUCC:	Success:	Definition: Processing OK. Information related to the result of the processing is contained in other parts of the response message.
Code: DFRD:	Deferred:	Definition: Procesing of the service is deferred.
Code: INPS:	InProgress:	Definition: Request is still in progress.
Code: NRTD:	NoReasonToDecline:	Definition: Validate the data that couold be verified.
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other type of processing result defined at national level.
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other type of processing result defined at private level.
Code: OTRD:	OtherResult:	Definition: Other type of result.
Code: PPRC:	PartiallyProcessed:	Definition: Processing of the service has been partially performed.
Code: REJT:	Rejected:	Definition: Service was rejected.
Code: UNRV:	UnderReview:	Definition: Service is under review.
Code: SUSP:	Suspended:	Definition: Transaction has been received but hasn't been processed.
Code: WARN:	Warning:	Definition: An additional Response Code, mainly a functional one, should be considered to identify the outcome of the request.

Response9Code.description:
Result of the performed service.
Code: DECL:	Declined:	Definition: Service is declined.
Code: APPR:	Approved:	Definition: Service has been successfuly provided.
Code: PART:	PartialApproved:	Definition: Service has been partialy provided.
Code: TECH:	TechnicalError:	Definition: Service cannot be provided for technical reason (eg timeout contacting the Issuer, security problem).
Code: FRTH:	FurtherAction:	Definition: Further action required to complete the transaction, for instance a referral.
Code: UNPR:	NotProcessed:	Definition: Advice message could not be processed.
Code: PRCS:	Processed:	Definition: Advice message is processed.
Code: FAIL:	Failure:	Definition: Processing of the request fails for various reasons. Some further processing according to the type of requested service, the context of the process, and some additional precision about the failure notified in the ErrorCondition data element.
Code: SUCC:	Success:	Definition: Processing OK. Information related to the result of the processing is contained in other parts of the response message.
Code: DFRD:	Deferred:	Definition: Procesing of the service is deferred.
Code: INPS:	InProgress:	Definition: Request is still in progress.
Code: NRTD:	NoReasonToDecline:	Definition: Validate the data that couold be verified.
Code: OTHN:	OtherNational:	Definition: Other type of processing result defined at national level.
Code: OTHP:	OtherPrivate:	Definition: Other type of processing result defined at private level.
Code: OTRD:	OtherResult:	Definition: Other type of result.
Code: PPRC:	PartiallyProcessed:	Definition: Processing of the service has been partially performed.
Code: REJT:	Rejected:	Definition: Service was rejected.
Code: UNRV:	UnderReview:	Definition: Service is under review.
Code: SUSP:	Suspended:	Definition: Transaction has been received but hasn't been processed.
Code: WARN:	Warning:	Definition: An additional Response Code, mainly a functional one, should be considered to identify the outcome of the request.

RetailerMessage1Code.description:
Identifies the type of process related to the message.
Code: SFSQ:	SaleFinancialServiceRequest:	Definition: Request a financial service like payment, reversal, loyalty, Balance Inquiry, etc.
Code: SFSP:	SaleFinancialServiceResponse:	Definition: Response to a financial service request.
Code: SFRQ:	SaleFinancialReconciliationRequest:	Definition: Request a reconciliation (different types) between Sale System and POI System.
Code: SFRP:	SaleFinancialReconciliationResponse:	Definition: Response to a Reconciliation Request.
Code: SASQ:	SessionManagementRequest:	Definition: Request the management of a session: login, logout and diagnosis services. Initiated by the Sale system.
Code: SASP:	SessionManagementResponse:	Definition: Response to a session management request to initiate/terminate a session.
Code: SAAQ:	AdminRequest:	Definition: To select and start customised administrative services provided by the POI, using a "menu" for an interactive or software interface, initiated by the Sale system.
Code: SAAP:	AdminResponse:	Definition: Response to the Admin request.
Code: SARQ:	ReportRequest:	Definition: To request, by the Sale System, a report on a list of transactions on the POI system, or the status of a transaction.
Code: SARP:	ReportResponse:	Definition: Response to a Report request.
Code: SSAB:	Abort:	Definition: Abort the current process or the last request.
Code: SSEN:	EventNotification:	Definition: Notify the other party of an event that occurs on its side.
Code: SSRJ:	Rejection:	Definition: Reject a previous received message, for technical or functional reasons.
Code: SSMQ:	MessageStatusRequest:	Definition: Request the status of a previous message for which the Sale system has no response.
Code: SSMR:	MessageStatusResponse:	Definition: Response to a Message Status request.
Code: SDDR:	DeviceRequest:	Definition: Request one or several functions of the device, from user Interface or payment peripherals on the POI system or on the Sale system. Functions can be Display, Input, Print, play sound, Card reader capabilities or Transmit a message.
Code: SDDP:	DeviceResponse:	Definition: Response to a Device request.

RetailerResultDetail1Code.description:
Result of the processing of the message
Code: ABRT:	Aborted:	Definition: The Initiator of the request has sent an Abort message request, which was accepted and processed.
Code: BUSY:	Busy:	Definition: The system is busy, try later.
Code: CANC:	Cancel:	Definition: The user has aborted the transaction on the PED keyboard, for instance during PIN entering.
Code: DEVO:	DeviceOut:	Definition: Device out of order.
Code: ICAR:	InsertedCard:	Definition: If the Input Device request a NotifyCardInputFlag and the Customer enters a card in the card reader without answers to the Input command, the POI abort the Input command processing, and answer a dedicated ErrorCondition value in the Input response message.
Code: WIPG:	InProgress:	Definition: The transaction is still in progress and then the command cannot be processed.
Code: LOUT:	LoggedOut:	Definition: Not logged in.
Code: NALW:	NotAllowed:	Definition: A service request is sent during a Service dialogue. A combination of services not possible to provide. During the DeviceInitialisationCardReader message processing, the user has entered a card which has to be protected by the POI, and cannot be processed with this device request from the external, and then the Sale System.
Code: TNFD:	NotFound:	Definition: The transaction is not found (e.g. for a reversal or a repeat).
Code: PAYR:	PaymentRestriction:	Definition: Some sale items are not payable by the card proposed by the Customer.
Code: REFU:	Refusal:	Definition: The transaction is refused by the host or by the local rules associated to the card or the POI.
Code: UNVD:	UnavailableDevice:	Definition: The hardware is not available (absent, not configured...).
Code: UNVS:	UnavailableService:	Definition: The service is not available (not implemented, not configured, protocol version too old...).
Code: IVCA:	InvalidCard:	Definition: The card entered by the Customer cannot be processed by the POI because this card is not configured in the system.
Code: NHOS:	UnreachableHost:	Definition: Acquirer or any host is unreachable or has not answered to an online request, so is considered as temporary unavailable. Depending on the Sale context, the request could be repeated (to be compared with "Refusal").
Code: WPIN:	WrongPIN:	Definition: The user has entered the PIN on the PED keyboard and the verification fails.

SaleCapabilities1Code.description:
Hardware capabilities of the Sale Terminal.
Code: CHST:	CashierStatus:	Definition: To display to the Cashier a new state on which the POI is entering. 	For instance, during a payment, the POI could display to the Cashier that POI request an authorisation to the host acquirer.
Code: CHER:	CashierError:	Definition: To display to the Cashier information related to an error situation occurring on the POI.
Code: CHDI:	CashierDisplay:	Definition: Standard Cashier display interface (to ask question, or to show information). 
Code: POIR:	POIReplication:	Definition: Information displayed on the Cardholder POI interface, replicated on the Cashier interface.
Code: CHIN:	CashierInput:	Definition: Any kind of keyboard allowing all or part of the commands 	of the Input message request from the Sale System to the POI System (InputCommand data element). The output device attached to this input device is the CashierDisplay device.
Code: CUAS:	CustomerAssistance:	Definition: Input of the Cardholder POI interface which can be entered by the Cashier to assist the Customer.
Code: CUDI:	CustomerDisplay:	Definition: Standard Customer display interface used by the POI System to ask question, or to show information to the Customer inside a Service dialogue.
Code: CUER:	CustomerError:	Definition: To display to the Customer information is related to an error situation occurring on the Sale Terminal during a Sale transaction.
Code: CUIN:	CustomerInput:	Definition: Any kind of keyboard allowing all or part of the commands 	of the Input message request from the Sale System to the POI System (InputCommand data element).
Code: PRRP:	PrinterReceipt:	Definition: Printer for the Payment receipt.
Code: PRDC:	PrinterDocument:	Definition: When the POI System wants to print specific document (check, dynamic currency conversion ...).
Code: PRVC:	PrinterVoucher:	Definition: Coupons, voucher or special ticket generated by the POI and to be printed.

SaleTokenScope1Code.description:
Scope of the token that identifies the payment mean of the customer.
Code: SNGL:	SingleUse:	Definition: The token is generated to recognise  a customer during the lifetime of a transaction.
Code: MULT:	MultipleUse:	Definition: The token is generated to recognise a customer for a longer period.

StoredValueAccountType1Code.description:
Type of stored value account.
Code: GIFT:	GiftCard:	Definition: Payment mean issued by retailers or banks as a substitute to a non-monetary gift. Usually, this Stored Value item is used only once.
Code: PHON:	PhoneCard:	Definition: Stored value instrument used to pay telephone services (e.g. card or identifier).
Code: OTHR:	OtherPrepaidAccount:	Definition: Other non listed stored value instrument.
Code: GCER:	GiftCertificate:	Definition: Certificate to be given to a customer. Usually one shot voucher.
Code: CARD:	SmartCardTag:	Definition: Stored value account hold on the chip of a smart card. 
Code: OLVC:	OnlineVoucher:	Definition: Voucher that can be used online once or in several times.
Code: CWVC:	CarwashVoucher:	Definition: Car wash specific account.
Code: MLVC:	MealVoucher:	Definition: Meal and check voucher for restaurants.
Code: MERC:	MerchantAccount:	Definition: Prepaid account open with a merchant or big retailers.
Code: TRVL:	Travel:	Definition: Travel prepaid account.
Code: ELMY:	ElectronicMoneyAccount:	Definition: Account supporting e-money issued by an electronic money issuer.
Code: BNKA:	BankPrepaidAccount:	Definition: Prepaid account managed by a financial institution for low income customers.
Code: CPYA:	CompanyPrepaidAccount:	Definition: Specific prepaid account for companies or professionals expenses.

StoredValueTransactionType3Code.description:
Identification of operation to proceed on the stored value account or the stored value card.
Code: RESV:	Reserve:	Definition: Reserve the account (e.g. get an activation code).
Code: ACTV:	Activate:	Definition: Activate the account or the card.
Code: LOAD:	Load:	Definition: Load the account or the card with money.
Code: ULOA:	Unload:	Definition: Unload the account.
Code: REVS:	Reverse:	Definition: Reverse an activation or loading.
Code: DUPL:	Duplicate:	Definition: Duplicate the code or number provided by the loading or activation.
Code: DCTV:	Deactivate:	Definition: Deactivate the account or the card.
Code: OPEN:	OpenAccount:	Definition: Open the account.
Code: CLOS:	CloseAccount:	Definition: Close the account.
Code: BALC:	Balance:	Definition: Balance enquiry.

SupportedPaymentOption2Code.description:
Specifies the options supported for a payment transaction.
Code: PART:	PartialApproval:	Definition: The entity supports a partial approval of the payment transaction.
Code: MSRV:	PaymentApprovalOnly:	Definition: The entity supports the approval of the payment service along with the decline of additional requested services (as cash-back).
Code: INSI:	IssuerInstalment:	Definition: The sender support IssuerInstalment proposals to the Cardholder.
Code: PINQ:	PINRequest:	Definition: The sender is able to support Single Tap transaction.

TMSContactLevel1Code.description:
Level of urgency in contacting the terminal management system.
Code: CRIT:	Critical:	Definition: Terminal management system has to be contacted before the next transaction.
Code: ASAP:	AsSoonAsPossible:	Definition: Terminal management system has to be contacted as soon as possible (for example after reconciliation).
Code: DTIM:	DateTime:	Definition: Terminal management system has to be contacted at the date and time provided.
Code: ENCS:	EndCustomerSession:	Definition: After the end of the customer session.

TimeUnit1Code.description:
Unit of time associated with the contract.
Code: SECO:	Second:	Definition: Time unit is second.
Code: MINU:	Minute:	Definition: Time unit is minute.
Code: HOUR:	Hour:	Definition: Time unit is hour.
Code: DAYC:	CalendarDay:	Definition: Time unit is calendar day.
Code: WEEK:	Week:	Definition: Time unit is week.
Code: MNTH:	Month:	Definition: Time unit is month.
Code: YEAR:	Year:	Definition: Time unit is year.

TrackFormat1Code.description:
Use to identify format of a track on a card or other documents like checks.
Code: ISOF:	ISOFormat:	Definition: ISO card track format - ISO 7813 - ISO 4909.
Code: JIS1:	JISIFormat:	Definition: Japanese track format I.
Code: JIS2:	JISIIFormat:	Definition: Japanese track format II.
Code: AAMV:	AAMVAFormat:	Definition: American driver license.
Code: CMC7:	CMC7CheckFormat:	Definition: Magnetic Ink Character Recognition, using the CMC-7 font - ISO 1004 Line at the bottom of a check containing the bank account and the check number.
Code: E13B:	E13BCheckFormat:	Definition: Magnetic Ink Character Recognition, using the E-13B font) Line at the bottom of a check containing the bank account and the check number.

TransactionChannel5Code.description:
Identifies the type of the communication channels used by the cardholder to the acceptor system.
Code: MAIL:	MailOrder:	Definition: Mail order.
Code: TLPH:	TelephoneOrder:	Definition: Telephone order.
Code: ECOM:	ElectronicCommerce:	Definition: Electronic commerce.
Code: TVPY:	TelevisionPayment:	Definition: Payment on television.
Code: BRAN:	OfficeOrBranch:	Definition: Office or branch.
Code: HOBA:	HomeBanking:	Definition: Home banking.
Code: FIAD:	FinancialAdvisor:	Definition: Financial advisor.
Code: MOBL:	MobilePayment:	Definition: Payment performed through a cardholder mobile device.
Code: SECM:	SecuredElectronicCommerce:	Definition: Electronic commerce with cardholder authentication.
Code: MPOS:	MobilePOS:	Definition: Payment performed through a merchant mobile device.

TransactionEnvironment1Code.description:
Indicates the environment of the transaction.
Code: MERC:	Merchant:	Definition: Merchant environment.
Code: PRIV:	Private:	Definition: Private environment.
Code: PUBL:	Public:	Definition: Public environment.
Code: BRCH:	Branch:	Definition: Bank environment.
Code: OTHR:	Other:	Definition: Other environments, for instance a mall or an airport.

TypeOfAmount8Code.description:
Qualifies the amount associated with the transaction.
Code: CSHB:	Cashback:	Definition: Cash-back amount.
Code: GRTY:	Gratuity:	Definition: Gratuity amount.
Code: FEES:	Fees:	Definition: Fees.
Code: RBTS:	Rebates:	Definition: Global rebate of the transaction. This amount is counted as a negative amount.
Code: VATX:	ValueAddedTax:	Definition: Value added tax amount.
Code: ACTL:	Actual:	Definition: Actual amount.
Code: RPLT:	Replacement:	Definition: Replacement amount.
Code: MAXI:	Maximum:	Definition: Maximum amount (the final amount must be less or equal).
Code: DFLT:	Default:	Definition: Default amount.
Code: ESTM:	Estimated:	Definition: Estimated amount (the final amount could be above or below).
Code: ORIG:	Original:	Definition: Original amount authorised during the real-time authorisation process.
Code: SRCH:	Surcharge:	Definition: Extra fee for a purchase or a withdrawal.
Code: SRVF:	ServiceFee:	Definition: Service fee.
Code: INTC:	InterchangeFee:	Definition: Interchange fee.
Code: DCNT:	Discount:	Definition: Discount, rebate or voucher, related to loyalty programs. This amount is counted as a negative amount.
Code: ATMF:	ATMCommissionFee:	Definition: Commission that the issuer will charge to the cardholder, which should be shown and accepted by the cardholder before the money is disbursed.
Code: AMTH:	AuthorisedAmount:	Definition: Transaction amount that has been authorised.
Code: CRDB:	CardRemainingBalance:	Definition: Remaining allowed amount for this type of transaction with this card, after the transaction, until the end of the card limit period.
Code: AMTX:	MaximumAllowedAmount:	Definition: Maximum amount allowed for the transaction in the transaction amount currency if the transaction amount of the request was declined.
Code: AMTN:	MinimumAllowedAmount:	Definition: Minimum amount allowed in the TransactionAmount currency if the transaction amount of the request was declined.
Code: AMTQ:	RequestedAmount:	Definition: Transaction amount that has been requested to be authorised.
Code: FEEI:	IssuerFees:	Definition: Fees amount from the card issuer.
Code: COMI:	IssuerCommission:	Definition: Commission from the card issuer.
Code: FEEH:	InterchangeFees:	Definition: Interchange fees.
Code: FEEP:	ProcessingFees:	Definition: Processing fees.
Code: FEEC:	CurrencyConversionFees:	Definition: Currency conversion fees.
Code: FEEA:	InternationalServiceAssessmentFees:	Definition: International service assessment fees.
Code: COMM:	Commission:	Definition: Commission, for example for DCC (Dynamic Currency Conversion) transactions.
Code: DONN:	Donation:	Definition: Donation amount.
Code: TAXT:	Tax:	Definition: Taxes applicable to the transaction.
Code: INCR:	Incremental:	Definition: Incremental amount for reservation.
Code: DECR:	Decremental:	Definition: Decremental amount for reservation.
Code: RESD:	Reserved:	Definition: Reserved or updated reserved amount for reservation.
Code: CONF:	ConfirmedAmount:	Definition: Actual amount that has been paid to the ultimate beneficiary, after all charges etc... have been deducted.
Code: INST:	InstructedAmount:	Definition: Amount of money to be moved between the debtor (ordering customer) and creditor, before deduction of charges, expressed in the currency as ordered by the initiating party.
Usage: This amount has to be transported unchanged through the transaction chain.
Code: ATAF:	ATMAccessFee:	Definition: Fee for giving access to an ATM.
